"특히 외국계 은행만큼 대출하는 지방에 본점을 둔 시중은행의 출현"이라고 기대했다.금융권에 따르면 대구은행은 시중은행으로 전환하는 데 큰 문제가 없을 것으로 예상된다. 대구은행이 금융당국 지지뿐만 아니라 이미 시중은행 인가를 위한 자본금 및 지배구조 등의 조건을 충족하고 있기 때문이다.은행법 제8조에 따르면 금융위원회 인가를 받기 위해서는 1000억원 이상의 자본금을 가지고 있어야 한다. 전자공시를 살펴보면 대구은행 자본금은 지난 1분기말 기준 6806억원2500만원이다.인가를 위한 지배구조는 금산분리 원칙에 근간을 둔다. 은행법 제16조2는 비금융주력자(산업 자본)의 은행 지분 보유 한도를 4%로 제한하고 있다. 대구은행은 DGB금융지주가 100% 지분을 가지고 있기에 지배구조에서도 문제없다.지난 3일 은행권 경영·영업관행·제도개선 방안 관련 사전 브리핑에서 김소영 금융위원회 부위원장은 "대구은행은 자본 기준을 충족하는 상태고, 지배구조 이슈가 있는데 현재 상황에서 큰 문제없어 보인다"며 "대구은행이 아직 전환 의사만 밝힌 상태이기 때문에 신청서가 오면 좀 더 자세하게 검토할 계획"이라고 말했다.이어 "(시중은행 전환이) 빠르게 빠르게 진행되면 올해 안에 가능하지 않을까 생각한다"고 첨언했다.◆기존 시중은행과 경쟁할 수 있을까…실효성 의문금융권에서는 지방은행을 시중은행으로 전환해서 5대 은행 과점 체제를 깨부술 수 있을지 의문을 표하고 있다. 지방은행이 이미 비대면으로 전국에 상품을 제공하고 있을 뿐만 아니라 체급 차이도 너무 많이 나기 때문이다. 지방은행이 시중은행으로 전환할 메리트가 약하다는 평가다.DGB대구은행 본점 전경. ⓒ DGB대구은행그나마 제약이였던 중소기업대출비율(이하 중기비율)이 완화된 것도 한몫한다. 중기비율은 원화자금대출 증가액 비중에서 정해진 비율만큼 중소기업으로 채워야 하는 규제다. 이 비율은 시중은행(45%)과 지방은행(60%) 간 차등 적용되고 있었다.하지만 한국은행 금융통화위원회가 지방은행에 대한 역차별 문제를 해소하기 위해 이달부터 중소기업대출비율을 이달부터 50%로 일원화한다.이러한 의문에 대해 김 부위원장은 "지방은행 크기가 일반 시중은행에 비해 작은 상황이기 때문에 정부도 당장 아주 큰 효과가 없을 수도 있다고 생각하고 있지만, 실제 효과는 우리 대구은행이 얼마나 노력하는지 굉장히 중요할 것 같다"고 말했다.이어 "일단 지금 시중은행에 경쟁자가 늘어난다는 것 자체에 큰 의미가 있다고 생각된다"며 "사실 (개선 방안으로) 많이 달라진 것 중 하나가 인가 원칙이 바뀐 점"이라고 덧붙였다.금융당국은 과점적 구조인 은행업에 언제든 경쟁자가 진입할 수 있도록 인가 원칙을 수정한다. 기존에 금융당국이 인가방침을 발표한 뒤 신규 은행의 인가 접수 및 심사를 진행했으나, 이제부터는 건전성과 사업계획 등 현행 법령상 요건만 충족하면 심사를 진행할 계획이다.김 부위원장은 "사실 기존에는 문이 닫혀있었지만 지금은 문이 열려있다"며 "어느 정도 요건이 필요하기 때문에 약간 문턱은 있겠지만 항상 잠재적 경쟁자가 들어올 수 있다는 인식을 주는게 중요하다"고 강조했다.
content_trans: Financial authorities will actively allow local banks to switch to commercial banks to promote competition in the banking sector. Daegu Bank has already expressed its intention to switch, and authorities have also given a positive assessment. Soon, a new player will enter a commercial bank for the first time in about 30 years.On the 5th, the Financial Services Commission and the Financial Supervisory Service (hereinafter referred to as the financial authorities) announced "measures to improve banking management, sales practices, and systems." The plan was designed to break down the oligopoly system in the banking sector, which is centered on the five major commercial banks (people, Shinhan, Woori, Hana, and Nonghyup).Earlier, the financial authorities operated a task force (TF) from February 22 to prepare a plan and held a total of 15 meetings. And on the same day, they prepared and disclosed final measures to improve banking management, business practices and systems.◆ Local banks 'conversion to commercial banks' The financial authorities have not allowed commercial and local banks to be approved since Pyeonghwa Bank in 1992. However, three Internet banks (K-Bank, Kakao Bank, and Toss Bank) have entered the banking sector since 2017, but their proportion is only about 2% within the banking sector.Preface to the Seoul Government Complex = Reporter Jang Min-tae In response, financial authorities actively allow local banks to expand their business areas and sizes, such as converting commercial banks, to stably promote competition in the banking sector in a short period of time. The vacancy will be allowed to be converted to local banks so that savings banks can fill it.The Financial Services Commission plans to review and decide whether to meet the requirements when financial companies such as local banks and savings banks apply for conversion. Currently, Daegu Bank, a local bank, has hinted at its intention to switch to a commercial bank.A financial authorities official said of Daegu Bank, "If converted, a new commercial bank will enter for the first time in about 30 years," adding, "In particular, it will be the emergence of commercial banks based in provinces that lend as much as foreign banks."According to the financial sector, Daegu Bank is expected to have no major problem in converting to a commercial bank. This is because Daegu Bank already meets conditions such as capital and governance structure for commercial bank approval as well as financial authorities' support.According to Article 8 of the Banking Act, in order to be approved by the Financial Services Commission, you must have a capital of at least 100 billion won. Looking at the electronic disclosure, Daegu Bank's capital was 680.6 billion won and 25 million won as of the end of the first quarter.The governance structure for accreditation is based on the principle of separation of industrial and industrial capital. Article 16 of the Banking Act limits the limit of non-financial players (industrial capital) to 4% for holding bank shares. Daegu Bank has no problem in its governance structure as DGB Financial Group holds a 100% stake.In a preliminary briefing on how to improve the banking sector's management, sales practices, and systems, Kim So-young, vice chairman of the Financial Services Commission, said, "Daegu Bank meets capital standards and there is a governance issue, but there seems to be no big problem."He added, "I think it will be possible within this year if (the conversion of commercial banks) proceeds quickly."◆ Will it be able to compete with existing commercial banks...The financial sector is questioning whether local banks can be converted into commercial banks to break the oligopoly system of the five major banks. This is because not only are local banks already providing products to the whole country non-face-to-face, but there are also too many weight differences. Analysts say that local banks have weak advantages to convert them into commercial banks.View of DGB Daegu Bank's headquarters. ⓒ The easing of the SME loan ratio (hereinafter referred to as the mid-term ratio), which was a constraint on DGB Daegu Bank, also plays a part. The mid-term ratio is a regulation that should be filled by small and medium-sized companies by a fixed ratio of the increase in won-based loans. This ratio was applied differently between commercial banks (45%) and local banks (60%).However, the Bank of Korea's Monetary Policy Committee will unify the loan ratio of small and medium-sized enterprises to 50% from this month to solve the problem of reverse discrimination against local banks.In response to these questions, Vice Chairman Kim said, "The government also thinks that the size of local banks may not be very effective immediately because they are smaller than ordinary commercial banks, but the actual effect will be very important how much our Daegu Bank strives.""First of all, I think it is very meaningful that the number of competitors in commercial banks is increasing," he added. "In fact, one of the things that has changed a lot (as an improvement plan) is that the principle of authorization has changed."Financial authorities revise the principle of authorization so that competitors can enter the banking industry, which is an oligopolistic structure, at any time. Previously, after the financial authorities announced the approval policy, they received and reviewed the approval of new banks, but from now on, they plan to conduct the review if they meet the current legal requirements such as soundness and business plans."In fact, the door was closed before, but now it is open," Vice Chairman Kim said. "There will be some thresholds because some requirements are needed, but it is important to always give the perception that potential competitors can come in."
message: The following news article is summarized in three sentences, limiting the length of the total answer to 300 characters. + content_trans
response: Financial authorities in South Korea are actively allowing local banks to convert into commercial banks in order to promote competition in the banking sector. Daegu Bank has expressed its intention to switch and is expected to be the first new commercial bank in about 30 years. The move is part of measures announced by the Financial Services Commission and the Financial Supervisory Service to improve banking management and sales practices in order to break down the oligopoly system in the banking sector.

title: [뱅크룸] 우리은행, 연체이자 납입시 원금상환 지원 외
title_trans: [Bank Room] Woori Bank, in addition to supporting principal repayment when paying overdue interest
content: 4일 뱅크룸. ⓒ 프라임경제 우리은행(316140)이 연체고객 대상 원금상환 지원 프로그램을 실시한다고 4일 밝혔다. 이날 KB국민은행(105560)과 신한은행(055550)은 외화 관련 이벤트를 공개했다.우리은행은 '우리상생금융 3·3패키지' 일환으로 △개인 △개인사업자 △중소기업 금융비용 부담을 완화하기 위해 연체원금을 줄여주는 상생 프로그램을 실시한다. 이번 프로그램은 내달부터 1년간 실시되며 연체이자를 납부한 금액만큼 원금을 자동 상환해준다. 지원대상은 우리은행에 연체 중인 원화대출이며, 지원 한도 및 횟수에는 제한이 없다. 아울러 우리은행은 보증서 대출 신규 고객에게 첫달 이자를 전액 환급해주는 캐시백 이벤트도 진행할 계획이다.KB국민은행은 △KB스타뱅킹 △리브Next △국민은행 홈페이지 등 비대면 채널을 통해 환전 신청한 고객을 대상으로 이벤트를 진행한다. 환전 신청자는 KB스타뱅킹에서 '모바일 번호표'를 발행한 뒤 영업점에서 환전 금액을 수령하면 된다. KB국민은행은 이들을 추첨해 총 1000명에게 스타벅스 커피 쿠폰을 지급할 계획이다. 당첨자는 오는 9월15일 KB스타뱅킹에서 공개된다.신한은행은 외화 예·적금 상품 가입 고객을 대상으로 모두투어 여행상품 할인쿠폰을 제공하는 이벤트를 실시한다. 신한은행 외화 예·적금 상품인 △Someday(썸데이)외화적금 △신한 Value-up 외화적립예금 △외화정기예금 △신한 Value-up 외화회전정기예금 가입시 모두투어 해외여행 패키지 상품 3% 할인 쿠폰을 받을 수 있다. 이벤트는 12월 31일까지 진행될 예정이다.
content_trans: Bank room on the 4th. ⓒ Prime Economy Woori Bank (316140) announced on the 4th that it will implement a principal repayment support program for overdue customers. On this day, KB Kookmin Bank (105560) and Shinhan Bank (055550) unveiled events related to foreign currency.As part of the "Woori Win-Win Finance 3·3 Package," Woori Bank will implement a win-win program to reduce overdue principal to ease the burden of financial costs for △individuals △individual businesses △small and medium-sized companies. This program will be implemented for one year from next month and will automatically repay the principal as much as the amount of overdue interest paid. The target of support is KRW loans overdue to Woori Bank, and there is no limit to the limit and number of support. In addition, Woori Bank plans to hold a cashback event to refund the full interest of the first month to new customers of guarantee loans.KB Kookmin Bank will hold an event for customers who have applied for currency exchange through non-face-to-face channels such as △ KB Star Banking △ LivNext △ Kookmin Bank's website. Applicants for exchange can issue a "mobile number ticket" from KB Star Banking and receive the exchange amount at the branch. KB Kookmin Bank plans to draw them and give Starbucks coffee coupons to a total of 1,000 people. The winners will be unveiled at KB Star Banking on September 15.Shinhan Bank will hold an event to provide discount coupons for all travel products to customers who subscribe to foreign currency deposits and installment savings products. Shinhan Bank's foreign currency deposit and installment savings product △ Someday foreign currency savings △ Shinhan Value-up foreign currency reserve deposit △ Shinhan Value-up foreign currency rotation regular deposit △ You can receive a 3% discount on all overseas travel package products. The event is scheduled to run until December 31.
message: The following news article is summarized in three sentences, limiting the length of the total answer to 300 characters. + content_trans
response: Woori Bank will offer a principal repayment support program for overdue customers automatically repaying the principal as much as the amount of overdue interest paid. KB Kookmin Bank will hold an event for customers who have applied for currency exchange through non-face-to-face channels offering Starbucks coffee coupons to 1000 people. Shinhan Bank will provide discount coupons for all travel products to customers who subscribe to foreign currency deposits and installment savings products.

title: 동양생명, 보험계약대출 최고금리 '9.9%→5.95%' 인하
title_trans: Tong Yang Life Insurance Cuts Top Interest Rate on Insurance Contract Loans '9.9% → 5.95%'
content: 동양생명(082640)이 보험계약대출(보험약관대출) 이용 고객들의 이자 부담을 덜기 위해 금리 확정형 상품의 보험계약대출 최고금리를 인하한다고 밝혔다.4일 동양생명은 보험계약대출에 적용되는 최고금리를 기존 9.9%에서 3.95%p 인하된 5.95%로 변경했다. 인하 금리는 지난 1일부터 적용됐다.동양생명이 금리 확정형 상품의 보험계약대출 최고금리를 인하한다고 밝혔다. ⓒ 동양생명동양생명은 최고 금리 인하의 혜택을 신규 고객뿐 아니라 기존 고객에게도 적용해 보다 많은 고객들이 이자 감소 혜택을 누릴 수 있도록 했다.변경된 최고금리를 적용받으면, 예정이율이 5.95% 이상인 상품을 통해 보험계약 대출을 받은 고객들은 가산금리가 전혀 적용되지 않는다. 가산금리 이자 부담 없이 기준금리인 예정이율 이자만 부담하면 된다. 다만, 금리 확정형 상품만 해당된다. 금리연동형 상품의 금리는 기존과 동일하다.동양생명 관계자는 "고물가 및 고금리 등으로 가계의 이자상환 부담이 커지고 있는 상황에서, 당사 보험계약대출 이용자들의 이자 부담을 줄이고자 최고금리를 인하했다"며 "동양생명을 신뢰하는 고객들을 위한 서비스를 지속적으로 제공할 것이다"고 말했다.
content_trans: Tongyang Life Insurance (082640) announced that it will cut the maximum interest rate on insurance contract loans for interest-setting products to ease the interest burden on customers who use insurance contract loans (insurance terms and conditions loans).On the 4th, Tong Yang Life Insurance changed the maximum interest rate applied to insurance contract loans from 9.9% to 5.95%, down 3.95%p from the previous 9.9%. The cut interest rate has been applied since the 1st.Tong Yang Life Insurance said it will cut the highest interest rate on insurance contract loans for interest-setting products. ⓒ Dongyang Life Insurance applied the benefits of the highest interest rate cut to existing customers as well as new customers, allowing more customers to enjoy interest reduction benefits.If the changed maximum interest rate is applied, customers who have received insurance contract loans through products with a scheduled interest rate of 5.95% or more will not be subject to any additional interest rate. You only have to pay the base interest rate, the scheduled interest rate, without paying the additional interest rate. However, only interest rate-setting products are applicable. Interest rates on interest-linked products are the same as before.An official from Tong Yang Life Insurance said, "We have lowered the maximum interest rate to reduce the interest burden on our insurance contract loan users at a time when households are burdened with high prices and high interest rates."
keyword1_trans: Tong Yang Life Insurance Co. Ltd.
message: The following news article is summarized in three sentences, limiting the length of the total answer to 300 characters. + content_trans
response: Tongyang Life Insurance has reduced the maximum interest rate on insurance contract loans from 9.9% to 5.95% benefiting both existing and new customers. This move aims to alleviate the financial burden on customers amidst rising prices and interest rates. However the interest rate reduction only applies to interest-setting products while interest rates on interest-linked products remain unchanged.

title: 이권 카르텔 문제…이복현 금감원장, 엄정한 감독·검사 주문
title_trans: Interest Cartel Problem…Financial Supervisory Service Governor Lee Bok-hyun Orders Strict Supervision and Inspection
content: 발언 중인 이복현 금융감독원장. = 장민태 기자 이복현 금융감독원장이 간부들에게 최근 이권 카르텔과 관련해 원칙 중심의 감독·검사업무 수행을 주문했다.4일 금융감독원(이하 금감원)은 '반부패·청렴 워크숍'을 개최했다. 이번 워크숍은 금감원 고위직 및 주요 보직자들의 반부패 의지를 고취하고 청렴 시책 추진동력을 확보하기 위해 마련됐다.이날 이 원장은 "최근 사회전반에 걸쳐 이권 카르텔이 문제 되는 만큼 원칙에 입각해 엄정하게 감독·검사업무를 수행해야 한다"며 "금감원 출신 금융사 임직원들과 사적 접촉 및 금융회사 취업에 있어서 한 치의 오해도 없어야 한다"고 강조했다.이어 "우리 언행이 국민 기대치에서 조금이라도 벗어나는 순간, 신뢰받는 금융감독기구를 향한 노력이 한순간에 물거품 될 수 있다"고 첨언했다.또 그는 반부패 총괄기관인 국민권익위원회 평가 기준을 예시로 들며 금감원 윤리기준을 높일 것을 당부했다.이 원장은 "도덕성에 대한 조직적 관심이 바쁜 현안 업무에 밀려 상대적으로 뒷순위에 그쳐왔다"며 "권익위원회는 공공기관 청렴도 측정 시 법규 위반 행위뿐만 아니라 업무처리 과정의 공정성·투명성까지도 평가한다"고 설명했다.이어 "더 이상 공직자 도덕성 또한 각 개인 노력에만 의지할 수 없다"며 "조직차원에서 꾸준한 개발과 함양, 전사적인 참여를 통해서만 달성할 수 있다"고 말했다.이복현 금융감독원장이 반부패·청렴 워크숍 행사장인 본원 2층 대강당에 입장하고 있다. = 장민태 기자이후 박희정 권익위원회 공익심사팀장이 금감원 고위직 대상으로 반부패·청렴교육을 실시했다. 교육은 갑질금지 등 행동강령과 청탁금지법, 이해충돌방지법 등으로 구성됐다.한편, 이날 워크숍은 참석자 전원이 전사적 참여와 실전의지를 담은 '반부패·청렴 다짐'을 외친 뒤 마무리됐다.
content_trans: Lee Bok-hyun, head of the Financial Supervisory Service, who is speaking. = Reporter Jang Min-tae, Lee Bok-hyun, head of the Financial Supervisory Service, recently ordered executives to carry out principle-oriented supervision and inspection work in relation to the interest cartel.On the 4th, the Financial Supervisory Service (hereinafter referred to as the Financial Supervisory Service) held an "anti-corruption and integrity workshop." This workshop was designed to inspire the anti-corruption will of high-ranking FSS officials and key officials and to secure the driving force for cleanliness policies."As interest cartels have recently become a problem throughout society, we should strictly supervise and inspect them based on principles," Director Lee said. "There should be no misunderstanding in private contact with executives and employees of financial companies."He added, "As soon as our words and actions deviate even a little from the public expectations, efforts toward a trusted financial supervisory body can be wasted in an instant."He also urged the FSS to raise ethical standards, citing the evaluation standards of the Anti-Corruption and Civil Rights Commission, an anti-corruption agency.Director Lee explained, "The organization's interest in morality has been relatively behind the busy pending tasks," adding, "When measuring the integrity of public institutions, the Anti-Corruption and Civil Rights Commission evaluates not only violations of laws but also fairness and transparency in the work process."He said, "The morality of public officials can no longer depend solely on each individual's efforts," adding, "It can only be achieved through steady development, cultivation, and company-wide participation at the organizational level."Lee Bok-hyun, head of the Financial Supervisory Service, is entering the auditorium on the second floor of the main office, the venue for the anti-corruption and integrity workshop. = After reporter Jang Min-tae, Park Hee-jung, head of the public interest review team of the Rights Commission, conducted anti-corruption and integrity education for high-ranking FSS positions. The education consists of a code of conduct, such as the prohibition of power abuse, the Anti-Solicitation Act, and the Conflict of Interest Prevention Act.Meanwhile, the workshop ended after all participants shouted "anti-corruption and integrity pledge" containing company-wide participation and willingness to practice.
message: The following news article is summarized in three sentences, limiting the length of the total answer to 300 characters. + content_trans
response: The head of the Financial Supervisory Service Lee Bok-hyun ordered executives to strictly supervise interest cartels and avoid private contact with financial company employees. He emphasized the need for the FSS to raise ethical standards and mentioned the evaluation standards of the Anti-Corruption and Civil Rights Commission. A workshop on anti-corruption and integrity was conducted including education on codes of conduct and a company-wide pledge.

title: "ESG경영 내재화" 한화생명, 지속가능경영보고서 발간
title_trans: "ESG Management Internalization" Hanwha Life Insurance Publishes Sustainable Management Report
content: 한화생명(088350)은 4일 ESG(환경·사회·지배구조)경영 성과와 향후 계획을 담은 '2023 지속가능경영보고서'를 발간했다. '지속가능한 내일을 위한 그린라이프 2030'을 목표로 환경·사회·지배구조 각 부문별 전략방향과 과제를 실천한 성과를 담았다.환경경영 성과로는 △업무시스템 디지털 전환 추진 △페이퍼리스 문화 조성 등으로 종이 사용량을 절감했다고 소개했다. 실제로 한화생명은 올해 전자약정시스템인 '한화 론 플래너'를 오픈했다. 또한, 소비자 맞춤형 약관 제작 시스템도 구축해 페이퍼리스 영업환경 조성에 힘쓰고 있다.한화생명은 2050년까지 탄소중립 달성을 목표로 기후변화 대응 전략을 수립해 경영활동에 반영하고 있다. 온실가스 배출량 등 데이터를 매년 산정해 공개하고 있다. 투자 결정 과정에서 재무적 요소뿐만 아니라 ESG요인도 고려하고 있다.한화생명은 4일 ESG경영 성과와 향후 계획을 담은 '2023 지속가능경영보고서'를 발간했다. ⓒ 한화생명사회경영 활동으로는 장애인 채용을 지속적으로 확대해 올해 법정장애인 의무 고용률을 100% 달성했다. 사회공헌활동, 소비자중심경영 활동을 통해 기업의 사회적 가치 구현을 강조했다.지배구조 선진화를 위한 여러 활동들도 소개했다. 한화생명은 거버넌스 체계를 개선하고 ESG 커뮤니케이션을 강화하는 등의 활동을 지속해왔다.  정보보안경영시스템 국제표준인 ISO27001 인증을 획득해 글로벌 수준의 정보보안체계를 운영 중이다.여승주 한화생명 대표이사는 "ESG경영을 내재화하고 가속화함으로써 더 나은 환경과 사회를 만드는 데 앞장설 것"이라며 "앞으로도 계속해서 다양한 이해관계자들과 소통하고 가치를 공유하며 더욱 신뢰받는 기업으로 성장해 나갈 것"이라고 말했다.한편, 한화생명은 2019년부터 매년 지속가능경영보고서를 발간하고 있다. 올해로 다섯 번째인 보고서는 지속가능경영 국제 표준 가이드라인인 GRI(Global Reporting Initiative) 기준과 미국 지속가능회계기준위원회(SASB) 기준을 준수해 객관성과 신뢰도를 높였다.
content_trans: Hanwha Life Insurance (088350) published the 2023 Sustainable Management Report on the 4th, which contains ESG (Environmental, Social, and Governance) management performance and future plans. It contains the achievements of implementing strategic directions and tasks in each sector of environment, society, and governance with the goal of "Green Life 2030 for a Sustainable Tomorrow."As for the achievements of environmental management, it was introduced that paper usage was reduced by △ promoting the digital transformation of the business system △ creating a paperless culture. In fact, Hanwha Life Insurance opened its electronic agreement system "Hanwha Loan Planner" this year. It is also striving to create a paperless business environment by establishing a customized consumer terms and conditions production system.Hanwha Life Insurance has established a strategy to respond to climate change with the aim of achieving carbon neutrality by 2050 and is reflecting it in its management activities. Data such as greenhouse gas emissions are calculated and disclosed every year. In the investment decision process, not only financial factors but also ESG factors are considered.Hanwha Life Insurance published the '2023 Sustainable Management Report' on the 4th, which contains ESG management performance and future plans. ⓒ Hanwha Life Insurance's social management activities continued to expand the employment of the disabled, achieving 100% of the mandatory employment rate for the legally disabled this year. It emphasized the realization of corporate social values through social contribution activities and consumer-centered management activities.It also introduced various activities to advance the governance structure. Hanwha Life Insurance has continued its activities such as improving its governance system and strengthening ESG communication.  It has obtained ISO27001 certification, an international standard for information security management systems, and is operating a global-level information security system.Yeo Seung-joo, CEO of Hanwha Life Insurance, said, "We will take the lead in creating a better environment and society by internalizing and accelerating ESG management. We will continue to communicate with various stakeholders, share values, and grow into a more trusted company."Meanwhile, Hanwha Life Insurance has been publishing a sustainable management report every year since 2019. The report, the fifth of its kind this year, increased objectivity and reliability by complying with the Global Reporting Initiative (GRI) standards and the U.S. Sustainable Accounting Standards Board (SASB) standards, which are international standards for sustainable management.
message: The following news article is summarized in three sentences, limiting the length of the total answer to 300 characters. + content_trans
response: Hanwha Life Insurance has published its 2023 Sustainable Management Report highlighting its ESG management performance and future plans. The report emphasizes achievements in environmental management including a reduction in paper usage through digital transformation initiatives. The company also aims to achieve carbon neutrality by 2050 and considers ESG factors in investment decisions. Additionally Hanwha Life Insurance focuses on social management activities such as expanding employment opportunities for the disabled and advancing its governance structure.

title: 손해보험 사회공헌협의회, '물막이판' 지원 사업 시행
title_trans: Non-life Insurance Social Contribution Council implements 'water shield' support project
content: 손해보험 사회공헌협의회는 희망브리지 전국재해구호협회와 지자체를 대상으로 여름철 장마 및 집중호우에 대비하기 위한 사회공헌사업을 본격 시행한다고 밝혔다.지원사업은 침수취약지역 반지하주택 등에 거주하는 주민과 복지기관이 대상이다. 3년간 30억원 규모의 물막이판과 역류방지시설 설치를 지원한다.먼저, 관악구 소재 사회복지기관 등에 물막이판 설치를 시작했다. 향후 반지하주택과 일반주택까지 설치를 확대할 계획이다.손해보험 사회공헌협의회가 장마철 집중호우에 대비하는 사회공헌사업을 진행한다. (왼쪽부터) 최성숙 신림종합사회복지관장, 박준희 관악구청장, 김지훈 손해보험협회 상무, 김정희 희망브리지 전국재해구호협회 사무총장. ⓒ 손해보험협회정지원 손해보험 사회공헌협의회 의장은 "지난해 집중호우로 많은 침수피해를 입었고 올해도 많은 비가 예상되는데, 이번 재난 예방사업이 침수피해를 줄이는데 도움이 되기를 바란다"며 "전국 지자체와 협의해 상습침수지역이나 재난취약지역 등 지원이 필요한 곳으로 사업을 확대해 나가겠다"고 말했다.김정희 희망브리지 사무총장은 "침수방지 시설 지원사업을 진행할 수 있도록 기금을 마련해준 손해보험 사회공헌협의회에 감사드린다"며 "다가오는 여름철 집중 호우를 대비한 침수방지시설 지원을 통해 관악구 주민 안전에 큰 효과가 있기를 기대한다"고 밝혔다.손해보험업계는 이번 재난피해 예방사업 뿐 아니라 이재민 임시주거 시설 제공, 재난취약지역 풍수해보험 지원 등 재난발생 시 피해 보상과 복구를 지원하고 있다. 3년간 총 70억원 규모의 사회공헌사업이다.한편, 4일 오전에는 서울 관악구 소재 사회복지관에서 해당 사업의 현장방문 행사가 열렸다.
content_trans: The Non-Life Insurance Social Contribution Council announced that it will implement social contribution projects in earnest to prepare for the rainy season and torrential rain in summer for the Hope Bridge National Disaster Relief Association and local governments.The support project is for residents and welfare institutions living in semi-underground houses in areas vulnerable to flooding. It will support the installation of 3 billion won worth of water shield and reflux prevention facilities for three years.First, the installation of water shields was started at social welfare institutions in Gwanak-gu. It plans to expand the installation to semi-underground houses and general houses in the future.The Non-Life Insurance Social Contribution Council will carry out social contribution projects to prepare for torrential rains during the rainy season. (From left) Choi Sung-sook, head of Sillim General Social Welfare Center, Park Joon-hee, head of Gwanak-gu Office, Kim Ji-hoon, managing director of the Non-Life Insurance Association, and Kim Jung-hee, secretary-general of the Hope Bridge National Disaster Relief Association. ⓒ Chung Ji-won, chairman of the Non-Life Insurance Social Contribution Council, said, "We suffered a lot of flooding last year due to torrential rains and are expected to rain this year. We hope this disaster prevention project will help reduce flooding damage."Kim Jung-hee, secretary-general of Hope Bridge, said, "We thank the Non-Life Insurance Social Contribution Council for raising funds to support flood prevention facilities," adding, "We hope that it will have a great effect on the safety of residents in Gwanak-gu."In addition to the disaster prevention project, the non-life insurance industry is supporting compensation and recovery in the event of a disaster, such as providing temporary housing facilities for victims and supporting storm and flood insurance in disaster-prone areas. It is a social contribution project worth a total of 7 billion won over three years.Meanwhile, on the morning of the 4th, an on-site visit event for the project was held at the Social Welfare Center in Gwanak-gu, Seoul.
message: The following news article is summarized in three sentences, limiting the length of the total answer to 300 characters. + content_trans
response: The Non-Life Insurance Social Contribution Council will implement social contribution projects to support flood prevention in vulnerable areas including the installation of water shields and reflux prevention facilities worth 3 billion won over three years. The project started with the installation of water shields at social welfare institutions in Gwanak-gu Seoul. The non-life insurance industry will also support compensation recovery and storm and flood insurance in disaster-prone areas with a total of 7 billion won in social contribution projects over three years.

title: 보이스피싱 피해자…'일괄지급정지' 영업점 신청 가능
title_trans: Victims of voice phishing...You can apply for a branch office for 'Bullet Payment Suspension'
content: 디지털 소외계층이 보이스피싱에 당했을 때 은행 영업점·고객센터 등에서 본인명의 계좌를 지급정지할 수 있게 된다.4일 금융당국에 따르면 '일괄지급정지 서비스'가 기존 온라인 채널에서 오프라인 채널까지 확대된다. 일괄지급정지 서비스는 지난해말 보이스피싱 피해자가 온라인 신청을 통해 계좌를 정지할 수 있도록 시행됐다.이어 이날 금융당국이 디지털 소외계층을 위해 일괄지급정지 서비스 신청 채널을 영업점 및 고객센터로 확대하는 2단계 운영방안을 마련한 것이다.서울 시내 현금인출기 모습. ⓒ 연합뉴스앞으로 금융소비자는 본인 거래 금융회사 영업점 방문 혹은 고객센터에 전화해 금융사기 피해 우려 계좌를 즉시 지급정지 신청할수 있다.이후 피해 우려가 종료되었다고 판단되는 경우에는 영업점을 방문해 지급정지한 모든 계좌에 대해 해제도 가능하다.금융당국 관계자는 "서비스 이용 혜택 확대로 금융소비자 편의 증대가 증대되고 신속한 피해 예방에 도움이 될 것으로 기대된다"며 "금융결제원과 함께 지속적으로 모니터링해 불편사항이 발생하는 즉시 개선해 나갈 계획"이라고 말했다.
content_trans: When digital underprivileged people are subjected to voice phishing, they will be able to suspend their accounts at bank branches and customer centers.According to the financial authorities on the 4th, the "bulk payment suspension service" will be expanded from existing online channels to offline channels. The collective payment suspension service was implemented at the end of last year to allow victims of voice phishing to suspend their accounts through online applications.The financial authorities then came up with a second-stage operation plan to expand the channels for applying for lump sum payment suspension services to branches and customer centers for the digital underprivileged.An ATM in downtown Seoul. ⓒ Yonhap News In the future, financial consumers can immediately apply for suspension of payments for accounts that are feared to be damaged by financial fraud by visiting their financial company's branches or calling customer centers.After that, if it is determined that the concern about damage has been terminated, it is also possible to cancel all accounts that have been suspended by visiting the branch.An official from the financial authorities said, "The expansion of service use benefits is expected to increase the convenience of financial consumers and help prevent damage quickly," adding, "We plan to continuously monitor with the Korea Financial Telecommunications & Clearings Institute to improve as soon as inconveniences occur."
message: The following news article is summarized in three sentences, limiting the length of the total answer to 300 characters. + content_trans
response: Financial authorities will expand the "bulk payment suspension service" to offline channels allowing digital underprivileged individuals to suspend their accounts in bank branches and customer centers due to voice phishing. This service was initially available only online. Financial consumers can now visit branches or call customer centers to apply for payment suspension and cancel suspended accounts if damage concerns are deemed resolved. The expansion aims to increase convenience and prevent financial fraud promptly.

title: 공정위, 시중은행 국고채 입찰과정 담합 조사
title_trans: Fair Trade Commission investigates collusion in bidding process for commercial banks' treasury bonds
content: ⓒ 연합뉴스 공정거래위원회(이하 공정위)가 시중은행 대상으로 국고채 입찰 담합 여부 조사에 나섰다.4일 금융권에 따르면 최근 공정위 카르텔조사국이 5개(제일·하나·농협·산업·기업) 은행과 5개(교보·대신·신한·한국·DB) 증권사를 현장조사했다. 이번 조사는 국고채 입찰과정에서 부당한 정보 교환 또는 담합을 했는지 여부가 중점인 것으로 알려졌다.공정위 관계자는 "조사 중인 사건에 대해서는 사실 여부를 확인해 줄 수 없다"며 "업계를 통해 확인했으면, 문제가 없어 보인다"고 설명했다.앞서 윤석열 대통령이 지난 2월 금융 분야 과점폐해를 언급한 이후 공정위는 금융업계 전반에 대한 조사에 착수했었다. 이때는 금리·수수료 책정 과정에서 담합을 살펴보기 위해서였다.이제 조사는 국고채 입찰 담합 여부로 확대됐다. 먼저 공정위는 지난달 20일 키움·메리츠·KB·NH투자·삼성·미래에셋 등 증권사에 대한 현장조사를 실시했다. 이어 조사가 다시 은행권으로 넘어온 것이다.한편, 금융감독 기관인 금감원 관계자는 "담합·독점 등 공정거래법 위반 사항이면 공정위에서 조사를 하는게 맞다"며 "공정위가 조사 과정에서 자본시장법 위반이 판단되면 금감원 쪽에 (도움을) 요청할 수도 있다"고 말했다.
content_trans: ⓒ Yonhap News Fair Trade Commission (hereinafter referred to as the Fair Trade Commission) has launched an investigation into commercial banks for collusion in bidding for treasury bonds.According to the financial sector on the 4th, the Fair Trade Commission Cartel Investigation Bureau recently conducted an on-site survey of five banks (Jeil, Hana, Nonghyup, Industry, and Enterprise) and five securities firms (Kyobo, Daishin, Shinhan, Korea, and DB). The investigation is known to focus on whether unfair information exchange or collusion was made during the bidding process for treasury bonds.An official from the Fair Trade Commission said, "We cannot confirm the fact of the case under investigation," adding, "If we have confirmed it through the industry, there seems to be no problem."The FTC had launched an investigation into the financial industry as a whole after Yoon Suk Yeol's president mentioned the financial sector's oligopoly in February. At this time, it was to examine collusion in the process of setting interest rates and fees.The investigation has now been expanded to include whether or not treasury bonds are bid-rigging. First, on the 20th of last month, the Fair Trade Commission conducted an on-site investigation on securities companies such as Kiwoom, Meritz, KB, NH Investment, Samsung, and Mirae Asset. The investigation then came back to the banking sector.Meanwhile, a Financial Supervisory Service official said, "If it violates the Fair Trade Act, such as collusion and monopoly, it is right for the FTC to investigate," adding, "If the FTC finds a violation of the Capital Market Act during the investigation, it may ask the FSS for help."
message: The following news article is summarized in three sentences, limiting the length of the total answer to 300 characters. + content_trans
response: The Fair Trade Commission is investigating commercial banks and securities firms for collusion in bidding for treasury bonds. The investigation is focused on whether there was unfair information exchange or collusion during the bidding process. This investigation follows a previous probe into the financial industry for possible collusion in setting interest rates and fees.

title: 한은 "향후 물가 상승률 3% 안팎…근원물가, 전망치 웃돌 수도"
title_trans: Bank of Korea said, "In the future, inflation rate is around 3%..."Core prices may exceed forecasts"
content: 서울 중구 소재 한국은행 본부 전경. ⓒ 한국은행 한국은행이 2%대를 기록한 소비자물가 상승률과 관련해 향후 다시 높아질 것이라는 예상을 내놓았다. 근원물가 상승률은 연간 전망치인 3.3%를 상회할 수 있을 것으로 봤다.4일 한국은행(이하 한은)은 김웅 부총재보 주재로 '물가 상황 점검회의'를 개최했다. 이 회의는 앞서 통계청에서 발표한 소비자물가를 살펴보고 향후 흐름을 점검하기 위해 마련됐다.이날 통계청에 따르면 지난달 소비자물가지수는 111.21(2020=100)로 전년 동월 대비 2.7% 올랐다. 소비자물가 상승률이 2%대를 기록한 건 약 21개월 만이다.김 부총재보는 "6월 소비자물가 상승률은 기저효과가 크게 작용하면서 예상대로 2%대로 둔화했다"며 "근원물가 상승률도 완만한 집세 둔화 흐름이 이어지는 가운데 개인서비스물가 오름폭 축소 등으로 둔화 폭이 확대됐다"고 말했다.근원물가 상승률은 지난 5월 3.9%를 기록해 전월 대비 0.1%p 낮아졌지만, 지난달에는 3.5%로 집계돼 전월 대비 0.4%p 하락했다. 실제로 둔화 폭이 확대되고 있다. 한은은 지난 5월25일 근원물가 연간 전망치로 3.3%를 내놓았다.김 부총재보는 "향후 소비자물가 상승률은 이달까지 둔화흐름을 이어가겠으나 이후 다시 높아져 연말까지 3% 안팎에서 등락할 것으로 예상된다"며 "근원물가는 완만한 둔화 흐름을 나타내는 가운데 지난 전망경로를 다소 상회할 수 있다"고 분석했다.이어 "물가 경로상에는 △국제유가 추이 △국내외 경기흐름 △공공요금 조정 등과 관련한 불확실성이 높은 상황"이라고 덧붙였다.
content_trans: View of Bank of Korea headquarters in Jung-gu, Seoul. ⓒ The Bank of Korea (BOK) said it is expected to rise again in the future in connection with consumer price growth, which hit the 2 percent range. Core inflation is expected to exceed the annual forecast of 3.3%.On the 4th, the Bank of Korea (hereinafter referred to as the Bank of Korea) held a "price situation inspection meeting" presided over by Deputy Governor Kim Woong. The meeting was organized to look at consumer prices announced earlier by the National Statistical Office and check future trends.According to the National Statistical Office, the consumer price index rose 2.7% year-on-year to 111.21 (2020 = 100) last month. It is the first time in about 21 months that consumer price growth has reached the 2% range.Deputy Governor Kim said, "The consumer price growth rate slowed to 2% as expected in June due to the large base effect," adding, "The source price growth rate has also expanded due to a gentle slowdown in rent."Core inflation fell 0.1 percentage point from the previous month to 3.9 percent in May, but it was tallied at 3.5 percent last month, down 0.4 percentage point from the previous month. In fact, the slowdown is expanding. The Bank of Korea released an annual forecast of 3.3 percent for core prices on May 25.Deputy Governor Kim said, "In the future, consumer price growth will continue to slow down until this month, but it is expected to rise again and fluctuate around 3% by the end of the year."He added, "In terms of price channels, there is high uncertainty related to △ trends in international oil prices △ domestic and foreign economic flows △ adjustment of public charges."
message: The following news article is summarized in three sentences, limiting the length of the total answer to 300 characters. + content_trans
response: The Bank of Korea (BOK) expects consumer price growth to rise again in connection with hitting the 2 percent range. Core inflation is predicted to exceed the annual forecast of 3.3%. However there is high uncertainty regarding international oil prices economic flows and public charges that could affect price trends.

title: SC제일은행 "하반기 투자전략…균형 잡힌 포트폴리오"
title_trans: SC First Bank's "Investment Strategy for the Second Half of the Year"Balanced Portfolio"
content: SC제일은행이 자산관리(WM) 고객을 위한 '2023년 하반기 글로벌 금융시장 전망 및 투자전략 보고서'를 발표했다고 4일 밝혔다.SC제일은행 전경. ⓒ SC제일은행이번 보고서에 따르면 상반기 금융시장은 △추가 긴축 불확실성 △미국 중소형 은행 파산 이슈 등으로 단기간 투자심리 위축이 발생했으나, 주요국 경제지표 및 기술주 주도 성장 기대를 바탕으로 양호한 흐름을 이어간 것으로 보인다.또 하반기로 접어들면서 금융시장에는 연초부터 이어진 주식시장의 강세가 지속될 것이라는 낙관론과 함께 심각한 경기침체 진입을 바라보는 비관적인 시각이 공존한다는 분석이다.이에 SC제일은행과 스탠다드차타드(SC)그룹 투자 전략 전문가들이 이번 보고서를 통해 제시한 2023년의 하반기 핵심 투자테마는 'C.A.L.M: 시장에 머무는 힘(Keep CALM and carry on)'이다.불안정한 시기일수록 시장의 변동성에 흔들리지 않는 'C.A.L.M' 전략을 활용해 안정적인 포트폴리오 다각화와 더불어 균형 잡힌 투자에 집중하는 것이 중요하다는 입장이다.세부 투자 전략으로는 △포트폴리오 내 우량 국공채 비중확대 및 주식 핵심보유를 통한 시장 기회 확보(Capitalise on market opportunities) △분산 투자를 통한 다각화로 포트폴리오 기반 강화(Allocate broadly) △아시아 주식 및 채권의 상대적 가치 부각 가능성 집중(Lean to Asia)등을 내세웠다.아울러 단기적인 기회를 모색하는 관점에서 주식 시장의 변동성 적극 활용(Manage volatility)도 제안했다.사친 밤바니(SachinBhambani) SC제일은행 자산관리부문장은 "앞으로도 고객들의 재무적 목표에 맞춘 최적의 자산배분 전략과 투자방향을 제시할 것"이라며 "C.A.L.M 전략으로 균형 잡힌 포트폴리오를 관리하고 올 하반기에도 성공적인 투자 성과를 거두길 바란다"고 말했다.
content_trans: SC First Bank announced on the 4th that it has released a "Global Financial Market Outlook and Investment Strategy Report for Asset Management (WM) customers in the second half of 2023.View of SC First Bank. ⓒ According to this report by SC First Bank, the financial market shrank for a short period of time due to △ additional tightening uncertainties △ the bankruptcy of small and medium-sized U.S. banks, but it seems to have continued a good trend based on economic indicators and technology-led growth expectations.In addition, analysts say that the financial market is optimistic that the stock market, which has continued to strengthen since the beginning of the year, and pessimistic views on entering a serious economic recession coexist.Accordingly, the key investment theme for the second half of 2023 presented by investment strategy experts from SC First Bank and Standard Chartered (SC) Group in this report is "C.A.L.M: Keep CALM and Carry On."They say that it is important to focus on balanced investment along with stable portfolio diversification by utilizing the "C.A.L.M" strategy, which is more volatile in the market.Detailed investment strategies include △ Capitalise on market opportunities by expanding the proportion of blue-chip government bonds in the portfolio and holding key stocks (Capitalise on market opportunities) △ Allocate broady through diversification through distributed investment △ Lean to Asia.In addition, it also proposed the active use of volatility in the stock market from the perspective of seeking short-term opportunities."We will continue to present optimal asset allocation strategies and investment directions tailored to customers' financial goals," said Sachin Bambani, head of SC First Bank's asset management division. "We hope to manage a balanced portfolio with the C.A.L.M strategy and achieve successful investment results in the second half of this year."
message: The following news article is summarized in three sentences, limiting the length of the total answer to 300 characters. + content_trans
response: SC First Bank has released a report on the global financial market outlook and investment strategy for the second half of 2023. Despite short-term uncertainties the market is expected to continue on a positive trend based on economic indicators and technology-led growth. The key investment theme recommended is "C.A.L.M" strategy focusing on balanced investment diversification and opportunities in the Asian market.

title: 금감원 권고에도…DB생명, 지주사 몰아주기 논란
title_trans: Despite the Financial Supervisory Service's recommendation...DB Life Insurance Co., Ltd. Controversy over Allocation of Holding Companies
content: DB생명이 지주사 DB Inc(012030)에 과도한 상표권 사용료를 지급하면서 '지주사 몰아주기' 논란에 휩싸였다. 그룹 내 계열사 DB손해보험도 같은 사례로 금융당국 지적을 받은 바 있어 비판을 면치 못할 것으로 보인다.3일 금융감독원에 따르면 DB생명은 투자영업수익 등을 포함한 상표권 사용료를 DB Inc에 지급한 것으로 파악됐다. 투자영업수익은 통상적으로 상표권 사용료에 포함되지 않는다. 이에 금감원은 지난달 19일 DB생명을 상대로 경영유의 조치를 내렸다.DB생명이 지주사에 과도한 상표권 사용료를 지급하면서 '지주사 몰아주기' 논란에 휩싸였다. 사진은 DB손해보험 본사 전경. ⓒ DB손해보험상표권료는 매출에서 광고선전비를 뺀 나머지 금액에 일정한 수수료율을 곱해서 계산한다. 이자･배당금 수익 등 투자영업수익은 상표 사용으로 인해 직접적인 경제적 효과가 발생한다고 보기 어렵다. 대부분의 기업이 투자영업수익을 상표권료에 포함하지 않는다.그러나 상표권 사용료가 내부 거래로 이뤄지는 만큼 별도제약이 없어 불합리한 방식으로 사용료율을 산정하는 사례가 꾸준히 발생하고 있다.문제는 그룹 내 계열사 DB손해보험도 2021년 같은 문제로 금감원으로부터 경영유의 조치를 받았다는 점이다.금감원 지적 이후에도 여전히 같은 산식으로 상표권료를 지급하면서 DB생명이 금감원의 개선 권고를 무시했다는 비판이 제기된다. 현재 DB Inc는 연간 300억원이 넘는 브랜드 수익을 올리고 있는 것으로 알려졌다.구체적으로 DB생명이 지난해 DB Inc에 지급한 연간 상표 사용료는 32억원으로 파악된다. 책정 산식에 적용된 수수료율은 0.15%다. DB손해보험이 지급한 상표 사용료는 266억원으로 알려졌다. DB그룹 내 보험사가 과도한 이름값을 DB Inc에 지급해 지주사 배불리기에 몰두하고 있다는 의견이 나온다.금융감독원은 "비금융업을 영위하는 대부분 기업의 경우 매출에 포함하지 않는 항목인데도 회사는 이를 매출에 포함한 채 상표 사용료 책정 산식을 정했다"며 "상표 사용과 무관한 수익 항목을 매출에서 제외하는 등 책정 산식의 합리성을 제고하는 방안을 마련할 필요가 있다"고 지적했다.
content_trans: DB Life Insurance has been embroiled in controversy over "allocating holding companies" as it paid excessive trademark fees to DB Inc (012030). DB Insurance, an affiliate of the group, is also expected to be criticized as it has been pointed out by financial authorities in the same case.According to the Financial Supervisory Service on the 3rd, DB Life Insurance paid trademark fees, including investment operating profits, to DB Inc. Investment operating income is not usually included in trademark fees. In response, the Financial Supervisory Service took management precautions against DB Life Insurance on the 19th of last month.DB Life Insurance has been embroiled in controversy over "allocating holding companies" as it paid excessive trademark fees to holding companies. The photo shows the view of DB Insurance headquarters. ⓒ DB non-life insurance trademark fees are calculated by multiplying the remaining amount obtained by subtracting advertising promotion costs from sales by a certain commission rate. It is difficult to say that investment operating income such as interest and dividend income has a direct economic effect due to the use of trademarks. Most companies do not include investment operating income in trademark fees.However, as trademark fees are made through internal transactions, there are consistent cases in which the user fee rate is calculated in an unreasonable manner because there are no separate restrictions.The problem is that DB Insurance, an affiliate of the group, also received management caution from the Financial Supervisory Service for the same problem in 2021.Criticism is raised that DB Life Insurance ignored the FSS's recommendation for improvement while still paying trademark fees in the same formula even after the Financial Supervisory Service pointed out. Currently, DB Inc is known to make more than 30 billion won in brand profits annually.Specifically, the annual trademark usage fee paid by DB Life Insurance to DB Inc last year is estimated to be 3.2 billion won. The commission rate applied to the formula is 0.15%. The trademark usage fee paid by DB Insurance is known to be 26.6 billion won. Some say that insurance companies in DB Group are focusing on distributing holding companies by paying excessive name values to DB Inc.The Financial Supervisory Service pointed out, "Most companies in the non-financial industry do not include it in sales, but the company has decided to set a trademark usage fee by including it in sales."
message: The following news article is summarized in three sentences, limiting the length of the total answer to 300 characters. + content_trans
response: DB Life Insurance has come under scrutiny for paying excessive trademark fees to DB Inc leading to allegations of "allocating holding companies." The Financial Supervisory Service has criticized DB Insurance an affiliate of the group for the same issue. Despite recommendations for improvement DB Life Insurance continued to pay trademark fees using the same formula even after being pointed out by the Financial Supervisory Service.

title: "초우량 업체 도약" 우리금융캐피탈, 정연기 대표이사 취임
title_trans: Woori Financial Capital Takes Over CEO Jeong Yeon-ki
content: 우리금융캐피탈은 정연기 신임 대표이사 취임식을 개최했다고 3일 밝혔다.우리금융 강남타워에서 열린 취임식에서 정연기 대표이사는 '2023년 경영목표 달성'과 '사업다각화와 선제적 리스크관리로 안정적 성장기반 구축'을 강조했다.정연기 대표이사는 "2023년 경영목표 달성으로 시장의 판을 바꾸는 업계 초우량 캐피탈사로 도약하자"고 말했다.우리금융캐피탈은 우리금융 강남타워에서 정연기 신임 대표이사 취임식을 개최했다고 3일 밝혔다. ⓒ 우리금융캐피탈아울러 정 대표이사는 하반기 중점 추진과제로 △핵심사업 역량강화 △미래성장 동력 확보 △선제적 리스크관리 강화 △디지털 역량 및 그룹시너지 강화 △일하는 방식의 혁신을 제시했다.또 사업다각화를 위해 기업 및 투자금융 비중을 확대하겠다고 약속했다. 이를 위해 위험관리 업종에 대한 모니터링 강화와 시스템기반의 리스크관리 체계 구축 등 리스크관리에 임직원 역량을 집중할 것을 주문했다.한편, 정 대표이사는 1991년 우리은행에 입행 한 이후 △개인영업전략본부 본부장 △자산관리그룹 집행부행장보 △금융소비자보호그룹 집행부행장보 △중소기업그룹 집행부행장 등을 역임했다.다양한 업무를 맡으면서 여신심사·카드사업·전략·영업 등 다양한 업무 경험을 바탕으로 우리금융캐피탈의 사업 포트폴리오 다각화 등 중장기 전략을 성공적으로 이끌 수 있는 최적임자로 평가받고 있다.
content_trans: Woori Financial Capital announced on the 3rd that it held an inauguration ceremony for the new CEO Jeong Yeon-ki.At the inauguration ceremony held at Woori Financial's Gangnam Tower, CEO Jeong Yeon-ki emphasized "achieving management goals in 2023" and "building a stable growth base through business diversification and preemptive risk management."CEO Jeong Yeon-ki said, "Let's leap into an industry-leading capital company that changes the market by achieving its management goals in 2023."Woori Financial Capital announced on the 3rd that it held the inauguration ceremony of the new CEO Jeong Yeon-ki at Woori Financial Gangnam Tower. ⓒ CEO Chung of Woori Financial Capital Aller suggested △ strengthening core business capabilities △ securing future growth engines △ strengthening preemptive risk management △ strengthening digital capabilities and group synergy △ innovation in the way of working.It also promised to increase the proportion of corporate and investment finance to diversify its business. To this end, it called for executives and employees to focus their capabilities on risk management, such as strengthening monitoring of the risk management industry and establishing a system-based risk management system.Meanwhile, CEO Chung has served as △ the head of the Personal Sales Strategy Headquarters, △ the asset management group's executive vice president, △ the financial consumer protection group's executive vice president, and △ the small and medium-sized business group's executive vice president since joining Woori Bank in 1991.He is considered the best person to successfully lead mid- to long-term strategies such as diversifying Woori Financial Capital's business portfolio based on various work experiences such as credit screening, card business, strategy, and sales.
message: The following news article is summarized in three sentences, limiting the length of the total answer to 300 characters. + content_trans
response: Woori Financial Capital held an inauguration ceremony for new CEO Jeong Yeon-ki. The CEO emphasized achieving management goals in 2023 through business diversification and risk management. The CEO's past experiences make him well-suited to lead the company's long-term strategies.

title: 진옥동 신한금융 회장 '내부통제 책무구조도' 조기 도입
title_trans: Shinhan Financial Group Chairman Jin Ok-dong Introduces 'Internal Control Responsibility Structure' Early
content: 진옥동 신한금융그룹(055550) 회장이 '내부통제 책무구조도'를 법령 통과 후 조기에 도입할 예정이라고 3일 밝혔다.진 회장은 이날 하반기 그룹 문화행사인 '신한컬처위크'에서 신한라이프 임직원 대상 첫 번째 CEO 강연을 진행했다.신한금융그룹, 그룹 창업기념일 맞아 '신한컬쳐위크' 운영. ⓒ 신한금융그룹그는 내부통제 책무구조도 도입에 관해 언급하며 "그룹의 지속성장가능성을 위해서는 철저한 내부 견제와 검증을 통해 업무의 모든 과정이 정당화돼야 한다"고 강조했다.내부통제 책무구조도란 금융사 임원 담당업무에 따른 내부통제 책무를 배분해 책임소재를 분명히 하는 지도다. 최근 금융당국은 경영문화 개선 및 건전한 소비자 보호 체계 정착을 목표로 추진을 발표한 바 있다.진 회장은 "재무적 1등보다 고객으로부터 인정받는 것이 진정한 일류"라며 "투자상품 사태 이후 뼈아픈 반성 속에서 한 단계 높은 내부 통제를 기반으로 고객과 사회로부터 인정받는 '일류' 신한을 위해 나아가자"고 당부했다.
content_trans: Shinhan Financial Group Chairman Jin Ok-dong (055550) announced on the 3rd that he will introduce the "Internal Control Responsibility Structure Map" early after passing the law.Chairman Jin gave his first CEO lecture to Shinhan Life executives and employees at the group's cultural event "Shinhan Culture Week" in the second half of the day.Shinhan Financial Group operates 'Shinhan Culture Week' to mark the group's founding anniversary. ⓒ Referring to the introduction of the internal control responsibility structure, Shinhan Financial Group said, "For the group's sustainable growth, the entire process of work must be justified through thorough internal checks and verification."The internal control responsibility structure map is a map that allocates internal control responsibilities according to the work of executives of financial companies to clarify where they are responsible. Recently, financial authorities announced their push with the aim of improving the management culture and establishing a sound consumer protection system.Chairman Jin said, "It is the real top priority to be recognized by customers rather than the top financial player," adding, "Let's move forward for Shinhan, the 'first-class' recognized by customers and society, based on a higher level of internal control amid painful reflection after the investment product crisis."
message: The following news article is summarized in three sentences, limiting the length of the total answer to 300 characters. + content_trans
response: Shinhan Financial Group Chairman Jin Ok-dong announced the introduction of an internal control responsibility structure map to ensure thorough internal checks and verification for the group's sustainable growth. The map will allocate control responsibilities to executives of financial companies to establish a sound consumer protection system. Chairman Jin emphasized the importance of being recognized by customers and society and aims for Shinhan to be a first-class institution.

title: 우리은행 '조병규호' 공식 출항…조직개편 예고
title_trans: Woori Bank's 'Cho Byung-kyu' official departure...Announcement of reorganization
content: 조병규 신임 우리은행장이 3일 임시주주총회에서 공식 취임했다. ⓒ 프라임경제 편집 조병규 신임 우리은행장이 공식 취임한 뒤 영업 중심의 조직개편을 예고했다.3일 조 행장이 임시주주총회에서 우리은행장으로 공식 취임했다. 임기는 오는 2024년 12월말까지다. 조 행장은 우리은행 본점 첫 출근길에서 "침체해 있던 인사·조직문화 등에 대해 임종룡 우리금융 회장 방향과 똑같이 생각하고 있다"고 말했다.이어 그는 "열심히 일하는 직원들이 조직에서 인정받고 또 그런 것들이 성과로 직원들한테 돌아갈 수 있게 하겠다"며 "임 회장과 잘 맞춰서 진행하려고 준비하고 있다"고 강조했다.조 행장은 개편 방향에 대해서도 임 화장과 동일한 방식을 언급했다. 앞서 임 회장은 지난달 30일 영업현장 중심의 인사권을 약속한 바 있다.조 행장은 "7월초 인사를 통해 영업 중심으로 개편하고 대면채널에서도 직원들이 경쟁력을 가질 수 있도록 조직을 바꾸고 있다"며 "현장에 모든 답이 있기에 직원들과 현장경영에 대해 소통을 강화하고 고객들 애로사항을 잘 해결하는 은행장이 되겠다"고 공언했다.아울러 조 행장은 본인의 강점인 '기업금융'을 우리은행 역량으로 강화하겠다는 의지를 표명했다.그는 "제가 은행에서 제일 많이 했던 부분이 기업금융이고 우리은행 창립 이념이 '기업과 같이 하는 은행'이기도 하다"며 "기업금융이 조금 약해졌는데, 최근 국가 경제가 신성장 산업으로 새로운 모멘텀을 만들려는 시점에 시중은행으로서 역할을 잘 준비하겠다"고 언급했다.한편, 조 행장은 취임 이후 첫 활동으로 오는 4일 인천 지역 영업점을 방문할 예정이다.
content_trans: Cho Byung-kyu, the new president of Woori Bank, officially took office at an extraordinary shareholders' meeting on the 3rd. ⓒ Prime Economy Editor Cho Byung-kyu, the new president of Woori Bank, officially took office, heralding a sales-oriented reorganization.President Cho officially took office as president of Woori Bank at an extraordinary shareholders' meeting on the 3rd. The term of office is until the end of December 2024. On his first way to work at Woori Bank's headquarters, President Cho said, "I feel the same way as Chairman Lim Jong-ryong of Woori Financial Group about the stagnant personnel and organizational culture.""We will allow hard-working employees to be recognized by the organization and return such things to the employees as results," he said. "We are preparing to proceed well with Chairman Lim."Regarding the direction of the reorganization, President Cho also mentioned the same method as wage and makeup. Earlier on the 30th of last month, Chairman Lim promised personnel rights centered on sales sites.President Cho said, "We are reorganizing into sales-oriented through personnel appointments in early July and changing the organization so that employees can be competitive in face-to-face channels," adding, "We will strengthen communication with employees and solve customers' difficulties.In addition, President Cho expressed his willingness to strengthen his strength, "corporate finance," with Woori Bank's capabilities."The part I did the most in the bank is corporate finance, and the founding ideology of Woori Bank is also 'a bank with companies,'" he said. "Corporate finance has weakened a little, and I will prepare well as a commercial bank at a time when the national economy is trying to create new momentum as a new growth industry."Meanwhile, President Cho is scheduled to visit a branch in Incheon on the 4th as his first activity since taking office.
message: The following news article is summarized in three sentences, limiting the length of the total answer to 300 characters. + content_trans
response: Cho Byung-kyu officially becomes president of Woori Bank aiming for a sales-oriented reorganization and addressing stagnant personnel and organizational culture. Cho plans to emphasize communication with employees and solve customer difficulties while strengthening corporate finance capabilities. His first activity as president is visiting a branch in Incheon.

title: 카카오뱅크, 주담대 대환 고객 '평균 321만원' 이자 절감
title_trans: Kakao Bank cuts interest on 'average 3.21 million won' for mortgage loan customers
content: 대출자가 카카오뱅크(323410) 주택담보대출 대환을 통해 개인당 평균 321만원의 이자를 절감한 것으로 나타났다.3일 카카오뱅크에 따르면 주택담보대출(이하 주담대) 차주가 2월22일부터 6월30일까지 대출 갈아타기 금리 할인 혜택으로 총 252억원의 이자를 아꼈다. 카카오뱅크 주담대는 대환 시 최대 0.6%p 금리 할인 혜택을 제공한다.은행연합회 공시 기준 카카오뱅크가 지난 5월 취급한 분할상환방식 주택담보대출 평균 금리는 연3.88%로, 16개 은행 중 유일한 3%대 금리다.이러한 금리의 영향으로 전체 주택담보대출 신규 고객 중 대환 고객 비중은 작년 4분기(28%)에 비해 올해 2분기(54%) 두 배 수준으로 증가했다.카카오뱅크 주담대 대환 설문조사. ⓒ 카카오뱅크대환 고객 600여명을 대상으로 실시한 설문조사에 따르면 약 90%가 카카오뱅크 선택 이유에 관한 응답으로 '금리가 저렴하다'를 택했다. 실제 카카오뱅크 주택담보대출로 갈아탄 고객은 연 평균 약 321만원 이자 절감이 가능했던 탓이다.카카오뱅크 평균 실행금리는 연 3.8%로, 기존 대출의 평균 금리(연 5.1%) 대비 평균적으로 1.3%p 하락한 수치다.기타지방 고객이 대환대출을 통해 평균적으로 감면받은 금리는 1.38%포인트로 수도권·광역시 평균보다 높았다. 최대 2.415%포인트 낮은 금리를 적용받아 연간 약 480만원의 이자를 아낀 고객도 나타났다.또 기타지방 고객이 평균적으로 감면받은 금리는 1.38%p로 수도권·광역시 고객들의 평균 폭보다 높았다. 최대 2.415%p 낮은 금리를 적용받은 고객도 나타났다. 이는 연 약 480만원의 이자를 아꼈다는 분석이다.아울러 응답고객 중 약 77%는 '중도상환해약금이 없다'를 선택 이유로 꼽는 등 금융비용 절감에 관해 긍정적인 반응을 보였다. 앱을 통한 서류 제출의 편리함과 같은 비대면 대출의 편의성을 선택하기도 했다.이에 카카오뱅크는 중도상환해약금 면제를 연말까지 연장할 예정이다. 지지난 6월까지 중도상환해약금 면제를 통해 고객들에게 절감해준 비용은 63억원이다. 카카오뱅크는 앞으로 출시 예정인 보금자리론과 분양잔금대출 등에서도 실질적인 혜택을 적용할 방침이다.
content_trans: It was found that the borrower saved an average of 3.21 million won per person through the repayment of Kakao Bank (323410) mortgage loans.According to Kakao Bank on the 3rd, borrowers of mortgage loans (hereinafter referred to as mortgage loans) saved a total of 25.2 billion won in interest from February 22nd to June 30th through interest rate discounts on loan transfers. Kakao Bank's mortgage loan offers a discount of up to 0.6%p in the event of a loan.Based on the announcement of the Korea Federation of Banks, the average interest rate on mortgage loans handled by Kakao Bank in May was 3.88% per year, the only interest rate in the 3% range among 16 banks.Due to these interest rates, the proportion of new mortgage customers out of all new mortgage customers doubled (54%) in the second quarter of this year compared to 28% in the fourth quarter of last year.Kakao Bank Housing Department Daehwan Survey. ⓒ According to a survey of 600 Kakao Bank replacement customers, about 90% chose "interest rates are low" as a response to the reason for choosing Kakao Bank. In fact, customers who transferred to Kakao Bank's mortgage loans were able to save an average of about 3.21 million won per year.Kakao Bank's average execution rate is 3.8% per year, an average decrease of 1.3%p from the average interest rate (5.1% per year) of existing loans.The average interest rate that customers in other regions received through repayment loans was 1.38 percentage points, higher than the average in the metropolitan area and metropolitan cities. Some customers saved about 4.8 million won in interest annually by applying interest rates up to 2.415 percentage points lower.In addition, the average interest rate that customers in other regions received was 1.38%p, higher than the average width of customers in the metropolitan area and metropolitan cities. There were also customers who applied interest rates up to 2.415%p lower. This is an analysis that it saved about 4.8 million won in interest per year.In addition, about 77% of the respondents responded positively to the reduction of financial costs, citing "no cancellation of intermediate repayment" as the reason for their choice. It also chose the convenience of non-face-to-face loans, such as the convenience of submitting documents through the app.Accordingly, Kakao Bank plans to extend the exemption from prepayment cancellation until the end of the year. Until June last year, the cost saved to customers through the exemption of prepayment cancellation was 6.3 billion won. Kakao Bank plans to apply practical benefits to Bogeumjari loans and pre-sale balance loans that are scheduled to be released in the future.
message: The following news article is summarized in three sentences, limiting the length of the total answer to 300 characters. + content_trans
response: According to Kakao Bank borrowers of mortgage loans saved an average of 3.21 million won per person through interest rate discounts. The average interest rate on mortgage loans handled by Kakao Bank was 3.88% per year lower than other banks. Customers also cited low interest rates and convenience as reasons for choosing Kakao Bank.

title: 은행권 대출 연체율 0.37%…32개월만에 최고
title_trans: Bank loan delinquency rate 0.37%...Best in 32 months
content: 국내 은행 연체율이 지난 4월말 기준 0.37%로 32개월만에 최고 수준을 나타냈다. ⓒ 연합사진 은행권 대출 연체율이 지난 4월말 0.37%를 기록해 32개월만에 최고치를 기록했다.3일 금융감독원이 발표한 '4월말 국내은행 원화대출 연체율 현황'에 따르면 은행권 연체율(1개월 이상 연체)은 0.37%로 전월말 대비 0.04%p 상승했다.이번 연체율은 2020년 8월(0.38%) 이후 가장 높은 수준이다. 신규연체 발생액은 1조8000억원으로 전월 대비 1000억원 증가했다. 반면 연체채권 정리규모는 9000억원으로 전월 대비 1조5000억원 감소했다.부문별로 살펴보면 기업대출 연체율은 0.39%로 전월말 대비 0.04%p 올랐다. 이는 대기업을 제외한 모든 기업 연체율이 전월말 대비 상승했기 때문이다.대기업 연체율은 0.09%로 전월말과 동일한 수준으로 나타났으나, 나머지 기업 연체율이 △중소기업(0.06%p) △중소기업대출(0.05%p) △개인사업자대출(0.04%p)순으로 모두 올랐다.가계대출 연체율은 0.34%로 전월말 대비 0.03%p 상승했다. 신용대출 등 기타대출이 가계대출 연체율 상승세를 견인했다. 주택담보대출 연체율은 0.67%로 전월말 대비 0.01%p 소폭 올랐다. 신용대출 등 기타대출 연체율은 0.67%로 전월말 대비 0.08%p 상승했다.금감원 관계자는 "은행 연체율은 최근 경제상황 등을 반영해 당분간 현재 추세가 유지될 수 있다"며 "연체율 추이가 금융시스템 부담으로 작용하지 않도록 상·매각 확대 등 건전성 관리 및 손실흡수능력 확충을 적극 유도하겠다"고 말했다.
content_trans: The delinquency rate of domestic banks stood at 0.37% as of the end of April, the highest level in 32 months. ⓒ The delinquency rate of bank loans in Yonhap Photo reached 0.37% at the end of April, the highest in 32 months.According to the Financial Supervisory Service's report on the 3rd, the delinquency rate of domestic banks' won loans at the end of April was 0.37%, up 0.04%p from the end of the previous month.This delinquency rate is the highest level since August 2020 (0.38%). The amount of new arrears was 1.8 trillion won, up 100 billion won from the previous month. On the other hand, the amount of overdue bonds was 900 billion won, down 1.5 trillion won from the previous month.By sector, the delinquency rate of corporate loans was 0.39%, up 0.04%p from the end of the previous month. This is because the delinquency rate of all companies except large companies rose from the end of the previous month.The delinquency rate of large companies was 0.09%, the same level as at the end of the previous month, but the delinquency rate of the rest of the companies rose in the order of △ SMEs (0.06%p) △ SME loans (0.05%p) △ individual business loans (0.04%p).The delinquency rate of household loans stood at 0.34 percent, up 0.03 percentage point from the end of the previous month. Other loans, including credit loans, led the rise in the delinquency rate of household loans. The mortgage delinquency rate stood at 0.67 percent, slightly up 0.01 percentage point from the end of the previous month. The delinquency rate of other loans, including credit loans, stood at 0.67 percent, up 0.08 percentage point from the end of the previous month.A Financial Supervisory Service official said, "The bank's delinquency rate can be maintained for the time being, reflecting the recent economic situation," adding, "We will actively encourage soundness management and loss absorption capacity by expanding sales to prevent the trend of the delinquency rate from acting as a burden on the financial system."
message: The following news article is summarized in three sentences, limiting the length of the total answer to 300 characters. + content_trans
response: The delinquency rate of domestic banks reached 0.37% at the end of April the highest in 32 months. The delinquency rate of corporate loans increased while the delinquency rate of large companies remained the same. The delinquency rate of household loans also rose with other loans leading the increase. The Financial Supervisory Service plans to encourage soundness management to prevent the delinquency rate from becoming a burden on the financial system.

title: 해외여행 의향 급증…선호 여행지·결제방식 변화 '눈길'
title_trans: Intention to Travel Abroad Surges...Changes in preferred travel destinations and payment methods 'eye'
content: 코로나19 엔데믹 국면에 접어들면서 억눌렸던 해외여행 수요가 폭발하는 모습이다. 비대면 문화 확산 등으로 인해 결제 수단 방식과 인기 해외 여행지도 변화하고 있어 눈길을 끈다.3일 글로벌 결제기술기업 비자(Visa)가 전국 만 18세 이상 성인남녀 1000명을 대상으로 조사한 해외여행 동향 조사 결과에 따르면, 1년 이내에 해외여행을 떠날 계획이 있다고 답한 비율은 전체 응답자의 55.1%다. 지난해 응답 46.4%보다 8.7%p 증가한 수치다.코로나19 엔데믹 국면에 접어들면서 억눌렸던 해외여행 수요가 폭발하고 있다. ⓒ 연합뉴스주요 결제수단은 현지 화폐보다 신용카드를 선호하는 모습을 보였다. 1년 내 해외여행 계획이 있는 응답자들이 뽑은 '해외여행 시 사용 예정인 결제 수단'은 신용카드가 77.7%, 현지 화폐는 61.6%로 나타났다. 화폐 73%, 신용카드 62%의 응답률을 기록했던 지난해와는 대조적이다. 코로나19 이후 비현금 결제에 대한 선호도가 높아진 영향으로 풀이된다.다음으로는 △모바일 페이(18.8%) △체크카드(15.3%) △모바일 애플리케이션 카드(13.2%) △선불카드(4.2%) 순으로 높은 응답률을 보였다. 모바일 페이를 사용하겠다고 응답한 비율은 신용카드나 현지 화폐에 비해서는 낮았지만, 전년 대비 5.7%p 증가하고 순위도 한 단계 상승했다.비자는 "신용카드 사용이 보편화됨에 따라 해외 여행지에서 현금 사용은 점차 감소할 것"이라며 "모바일 페이 역시 향후 해외 여행지 결제 수단으로 적극 활용될 것으로 보인다"고 전망했다.항공권 및 호텔 숙박 비용을 제외한 순수 경비에 대해 질문한 결과 100만원 이상 사용하겠다고 응답한 비율은 60.8%에 달했다. 구간 별로 살펴보면 △50만~100만원(29,8%) △100만~200만원(26%) △200만~300만원(16.4%) △50만원 미만(9.4%) 순이었다.해외여행 선호 결제수단 조사 표. ⓒ 비자 코리아선호도가 높은 여행지는 △일본(26.7%) △호주(12.9%) △베트남(6.3%)으로 나타났다. 일본은 지난해와 올해 모두 한국인이 가장 선호하는 여행지로 확인됐다. 태국(5.4%), 미국(4.8%), 하와이(4.5%), 싱가포르(2.8%) 순으로 높은 선호도를 기록했다.특히 올해는 지난해 상위 10위권에 포함되지 않았던 호주가 2위를 차지한 점이 눈에 띈다.  시드니를 비롯해 △멜버른 △크레이트오션로드 △브리즈번 △퍼스 등 호주 현지에 대한 국내 인지도가 상승한 영향과, 이달 하순 FIFA 여자 월드컵 축구대회를 앞두고 있는 점 등이 영향을 끼친 것으로 분석된다.패트릭 스토리 비자 코리아 사장은 "전 세계가 엔데믹에 접어듦에 따라 해외여행에 대한 국내 소비자들의 관심과 수요가 지난해보다도 더욱 증가하고 있다는 점을 확인할 수 있었다"고 말했다.
content_trans: Demand for overseas travel, which had been suppressed as it entered the COVID-19 pandemic, appears to be exploding. Due to the spread of non-face-to-face culture, payment methods and popular overseas travel are also changing, drawing attention.According to a survey of 1,000 adult men and women aged 18 or older nationwide conducted by Visa, a global payment technology company, 55.1% of all respondents said they plan to travel abroad within a year. The figure is an increase of 8.7%p from 46.4% last year.As the COVID-19 pandemic enters, demand for overseas travel, which had been suppressed, is exploding. ⓒ Yonhap News Agency's major payment methods showed that they preferred credit cards to local currencies. Credit cards accounted for 77.7% and local currency 61.6% of the "payment methods to be used for overseas trips" selected by respondents who have plans to travel abroad within a year. This is in contrast to last year's response rate of 73% for currency and 62% for credit cards. This is attributed to the increased preference for non-cash payments after COVID-19.Next, △ Mobile Pay (18.8%) △ Check Card (15.3%) △ Mobile Application Card (13.2%) △ Advance Card (4.2%) showed the highest response rate. The percentage of respondents who said they would use mobile pay was lower than that of credit cards or local currencies, but it increased 5.7 percentage points year-on-year and the ranking rose one notch.Visa predicted, "As the use of credit cards becomes more common, the use of cash in overseas travel destinations will gradually decrease," adding, "Mobile Pay is also expected to be actively used as a means of paying for overseas travel destinations in the future."When asked about pure expenses excluding flight tickets and hotel accommodation costs, 60.8% said they would use more than 1 million won. By section, it was △ 500,000 to 1 million won (29,8%) △ 1 million to 2 million won (26%) △ 2 million to 3 million won (16.4%) △ less than 500,000 won (9.4%).Survey table of preferred payment methods for overseas travel. ⓒ Travel destinations with high preference for Visa Korea were △ Japan (26.7%) △ Australia (12.9%) and △ Vietnam (6.3%). Japan has been identified as the most preferred destination for Koreans both last year and this year. Thailand (5.4%), the United States (4.8%), Hawaii (4.5%), and Singapore (2.8%).In particular, it is notable that Australia, which was not included in the top 10 last year, ranked second this year.  Analysts say that the impact of rising domestic awareness in Australia, including Sydney, △ Melbourne △ Crate Ocean Road △ Brisbane △ Perth, and the upcoming FIFA Women's World Cup soccer tournament later this month have affected."As the world enters an endemic, we have confirmed that domestic consumers' interest and demand for overseas travel are increasing more than last year," said Patrick Story, president of Visa Korea.
message: The following news article is summarized in three sentences, limiting the length of the total answer to 300 characters. + content_trans
response: Demand for overseas travel is surging as the COVID-19 pandemic subsides with 55.1% of respondents in a survey planning to travel abroad within a year a significant increase from last year. Credit cards are preferred over local currencies for payment methods accounting for 77.7% of choices indicating a growing preference for non-cash payments. Japan remains the top choice for Korean travelers while Australia ranks second due to increased domestic awareness and upcoming events.

title: [보험 TMI] NH농협생명·동양생명·교보생명 외
title_trans: [Insurance TMI] NH Nonghyup Life Insurance, Dongyang Life Insurance, Kyobo Life Insurance, etc
content: 보험 시장은 국민 대다수가 가입할 만큼 풍부한 수요를 확보했음에도, 치열한 경쟁이 펼쳐지는 '레드오션'으로 꼽힌다. 이에 보험사는 시장 내 입지 확보 차원에서 각종 새로운 상품과 마케팅과 같은 프로모션을 쏟아내고 있다. 본지는 'T·M·I(Too Much Insurance)'를 통해 보험사 정보를 들려주고자 한다.오늘의 보험 TMI 주인공 △NH농협생명 △동양생명 △교보생명 △한화손해보험 △AXA손해보험◆NH농협생명, 경쟁력 높인 신상품 3종 출시NH농협생명이 신상품 3종을 3일 출시했다. 신상품은 △병원비든든NH의료비보장보험(갱, 무) △369뉴테크NH암보험(무) △하나로든든NH연금보험(무)이다.병원비든든NH의료비보장보험(갱, 무)는 질병코드, 수술 여부에 관계없이 급여의료 본인부담금을 보장하는 건강보험이다. 보험금 지급 후 소멸되는 기존 건강보험과는 다르게 매년 보장금액이 리필돼 최초 가입시점과 동일한 기준으로 보장금액이 복원된다. 주 계약만 가입해도 모든 질병·재해로 인한 급여의료비 본인부담금을 보장한다. 치료·수술·입원·통원치료를 보장한다. 보험금은 모바일 간편 동의로 지급받을 수 있다.NH농협생명이 신상품 3종을 3일 출시했다. ⓒ NH농협생명369뉴테크NH암보험(무)은 기존 암보험과 다르게 주 계약에서 암 검사부터 수술자금까지 한 번에 보장한다. 신규 암검사비 5종(MRI·암CT·PET·암초음파·특정급여NGS유전자패널검사)을 탑재하고 암수술보험금(치료비) 중심으로 설계됐다. 보험료는 3·6·9만원으로 선택해 가입 가능하다. 8가지 특약을 구성해 필요한 보장을 선택할 수 있다.하나로든든NH연금보험(무)은 일시납 운영 하이브리드 연금보험이다. 적립액 적용이율이 가입 후 5년 이내는 3.9%의 확정이율, 가입 후 5년 초과 시 공시이율을 적용한다. 가입금액 1억원, 남자 40세 기준 5년 경과시점 환급률은 118%이다. 5년 경과시점에는 기본보험료의 2.2%를, 10년 경과시점에는 기본보험료의 2.0%를 추가 적립보너스로 지급한다. 납입은 일시납으로 연금개시나이는 45세에서 80세다.◆동양생명, 유병자 가입문턱 낮춘 보험 출시동양생명(082640)이 유병자 맞춤형 종합간편보험 '(무)수호천사NEW간편내가만드는보장보험'을 출시했다. 해당 보험은 가입자가 세분화된 특약 급부를 활용해 필요한 보장을 선택하고, 간편하게 가입할 수 있도록 개발한 상품이다.간편보험으로 가입 시 △2개월 내 입원 필요 소견, 수술 필요 소견, 추가 검사 필요 소견 여부 △N년내 입원 여부(N=0인 경우 입원 여부 질문 없음) △5년 내 질병 여부(암·협심증·심근경색·뇌졸중·간경화·심장판막증·투석 중인 만성신부전증) 등 3개 항목만 고지하면 된다. N년 이내 입원 및 수술 여부가 아닌 입원여부만 고지하게 해 가입문턱을 대폭 낮췄다.동양생명이 유병자 맞춤형 종합간편보험을 출시했다. ⓒ 동양생명상품은 사망 보장을 주 계약으로 사망 시 100만원의 사망보험금을 지급한다. 또 암·질병 및 재해·입원·수술 등 73개의 다양한 특약 가입을 통해 주요 담보를 하나의 보험으로 모두 보장받을 수 있다. 주계약 가입금액 100만원 기준이다.다양한 예방·전조 증상 및 치료 관련 특약이 특징이다. '(무)간편급여암MRI검사지원특약(갱신형)'은 암의 진단 및 치료를 목적으로 급여 MRI 검사 시 연간 1회에 한해 5만원을 지급한다. '(무)간편간암진단비특약' 및 '(무)간편위암진단비특약'은 보험기간 중 각각 간암, 위암 진단 시 최초 1회에 한해 1000만원을 보장한다. 이외에도 △(무)간편암다빈치로봇수술특약(갱신형)_암Ⅰ보장형 △(무)간편특정심장질환(기타 부정맥포함)진단특약 등 다양한 상품을 마련했다.질병입원 및 질병수술 등 의료보장특약도 한층 강화했다. ‘(무)간편의료보장(질병입원)특약’은 1~3종 질병까지는 1입원일 당 최소 2만원~최대 5만원을, 4~6종 질병은 1만원을 보장한다. 수술형은 최대 300만원까지 보장한다.아울러 계약전환제도를 운영해 보험료 납입 부담을 완화했다. 최초 계약일 이후 무사고 시 매년 고지형태를 조정해 본인의 건강상태에 맞춘 보험료를 납입할 수 있다. 가입 나이는 만 15세부터 80세까지다. 고령 유병자 보험의 사각지대를 해소했다는 설명이다.◆'3040 선택권 확대' 교보생명, e보험 상품 출시교보생명은 소비자가 직접 모바일을 통해 보험 가입을 할 수 있는 채널을 오픈하고 총 7종의 e보험 상품을 출시한다고 3일 밝혔다.이번 모바일 보험 가입 채널에서는 디지털에 익숙한 3040세대 소비자 선택권을 확대하는데 초점을 맞췄다. 소비자가 일상에서 발생하는 위험 보장은 물론 주요 질병 보장까지 각자 상황에 맞는 꼭 필요한 보장을 모바일로 직접 선택, 가입할 수 있는 점이 특징이다.교보생명이 20년 연속 KSQI 우수콜센터에 선정됐다. ⓒ 교보생명e보험 상품은 △암케어 △용종케어 △뇌·심장케어 △생활습관케어 △감염케어 △상해케어 △1년 저축보험 등 간편하게 가입할 수 있는 7종의 미니보험으로 구성됐다. 가입 고객이 남긴 가입 리뷰와 상품별 자주 묻는 질문 등을 활용해 자신에게 꼭 맞는 상품을 선택하는데 도움을 받을 수 있다.e보험에 가입한 이들에게 전화·대면 상담 등 모든 채널의 상담과 유지서비스를 지원하며 탐색-가입-유지 전반에 걸친 경험을 제공할 계획이다.교보생명은 이번 채널이 관계사 전체 협업 과정에 있어 핵심 역할을 할 것으로 보고 있다. 고객에게 개인별 맞춤형 서비스를 제공하기 위한 그룹 차원의 시너지 효과를 기대하고 있다.◆한화손보, 한화 시그니처 여성 건강보험 출시한화손해보험(000370)은 여성전용보험 '한화 시그니처 여성 건강보험' 신상품을 3일부터 판매한다. 여성 생애주기를 고려한 특약과 출산지원 및 난임 케어 등 서비스를 제공하는 것이 특징이다.상품은 지난 6월 설립한 LIFEPLUS 펨테크연구소의 1호 작품이다. 생리·임신·출산·갱년기·폐경 등 여성 고유의 생리현상을 비롯해 유방암·갑상선암·난소·자궁암 등 여성에 특화된 보장과 서비스를 담은 상품이다. △여성특화통합진단비 △출산지원패키지 △난임 케어 패키지 △무사고전환 할인제도 등 여성의 특화 위험에 포커스를 맞췄다.한화손해보험이 한화 시그니처 여성 건강보험을 출시했다. ⓒ 한화손해보험특히 업계 최초 여성특화통합진단비를 신설한 것이 특징이다. 유방·난소·자궁·갑상선 등 암 진단비는 물론 갑상선기능 항진증 등 암 전조증상 진단까지 하나의 특약으로 폭넓게 보장한다. 상품은 '50%이상후유장해 및 뇌혈관·허혈성심장질환'을 납입지원 특약 요건에 추가했다.출산지원패키지는 출산 후 휴직으로 인해 가계소득은 떨어지는 반면, 육아로 인한 당장의 생활비 증가에 부담을 느끼는 여성들의 의견을 수렴해 개발했다. 출산 후 1년은 보장보험료를 한화손해보험이 부담한다. 육아 등으로 휴직 시 1년간 보험료는 납입을 유예해 보험료 부담을 줄였다.난임케어패키지는 저출산과 여성난임 문제를 지원하기 위해 연구해 개발된 특약이다. 난임의 진단-치료-출산의 난임 치료 싸이클에 맞춰 특약을 구성했다. 난임 진단 시 최초 1회 100만원을 지급하고, 급여 인공수정치료 시 최대 300만원의 가입금액을 제공한다. 난임치료 후 출산 시 최대 400만원의 축하금을 준다. 3년·10년 만기 갱신형으로 운영한다. 가입 연령은 만15세에서 70세다.◆AXA손해보험, 운전자 할인 특약 강화AXA손해보험이 운전자 할인 특약을 강화한다. 새롭게 강화된 특약은 △티맵 안전운전 특약 △카카오내비 안전운전 특약 △블랙박스 특약 △안전장치 장착 특약 △3049 특약 총 5종이다.티맵 안전운전 특약과 카카오내비 안전운전 특약은 최근 6개월 이내 1000㎞ 이상 안전운전 점수가 일정 기준에 도달하면 5% 할인이 가능하다. 티맵 안전운전 특약은 80점 이상, 카카오내비 안전운전 특약은 70점 이상을 기준으로 하며 오는 4일부터 시행된다.AXA손해보험이 운전자 할인 특약을 강화한다. ⓒ AXA손해보험아울러 △블랙박스 특약 △안전장치 장착 특약 △3049 특약은 7월11일 가입자부터 기존보다 높은 할인율이 적용된다.블랙박스 특약은 피보험 자동차가 블랙박스를 장착하면 2.6%에서 3.5%로, 안전장치 장착 특약은 자동비상제동장치, 차선이탈경고장치가 장착돼 출고된 경우 8.9%에서 10%로 할인율을 높였다. 3049 특약은 피보험자가 만 30세 이상에서 만 49세 이하이며, 부부 또는 1인 특약을 가입한 경우 기존 평균 9%에서 평균 10.9%로 할인율을 확대했다.
content_trans: The insurance market is considered a "red ocean" where fierce competition takes place, even though it has secured abundant demand for the majority of the people to subscribe. Accordingly, insurance companies are pouring out promotions such as various new products and marketing to secure a position in the market. This paper intends to tell insurance company information through "T, M, and I (Too Much Insurance).Today's insurance TMI hero △ NH Nonghyup Life Insurance △ Dongyang Life △ Kyobo Life △ Hanwha Insurance △ AXA Insurance ◆ NH Nonghyup Life Insurance, and three new products released on the 3rd. The new products are △ hospital expenses or NH medical expenses guarantee insurance (gang, no), △369 New Tech NH Cancer Insurance (no), and △ Hanaden NH Pension Insurance (no).NH Medical Expense Guarantee Insurance (Gang, Mu) is a health insurance that guarantees the out-of-pocket payment of medical benefits regardless of disease code or surgery. Unlike existing health insurance, which disappears after paying insurance, the coverage amount is refilled every year and restored on the same basis as the initial subscription. Even if you sign up for the main contract alone, you will be guaranteed to pay for medical expenses due to all diseases and disasters. It guarantees treatment, surgery, hospitalization, and outpatient treatment. Insurance money can be paid with mobile simple consent.NH Nonghyup Life Insurance released three new products on the 3rd. ⓒ Unlike existing cancer insurance, NH Nonghyup Life Insurance 369 New Tech NH Cancer Insurance (Non) guarantees from cancer tests to surgical funds in the main contract at once. It is equipped with five new cancer test costs (MRI, cancer CT, PET, cancer ultrasound, and specific benefit NGS gene panel tests) and is designed to focus on cancer surgery insurance (treatment costs). Insurance premiums can be selected at 3, 6, and 90,000 won. You can select the necessary guarantees by forming eight special contracts.Hanaroden NH Pension Insurance (Non) is a lump sum operation hybrid pension insurance. The reserve application rate is 3.9% within 5 years of subscription, and the official rate is applied if it exceeds 5 years after subscription. Based on the subscription amount of 100 million won and the male age of 40 years, the refund rate is 118%. 2.2% of the basic insurance premium shall be paid at the end of five years and 2.0% of the basic insurance premium shall be paid as an additional accumulated bonus at the end of 10 years. Payment is a lump sum payment, and the pension commencement age is 45 to 80.◆Dongyang Life Insurance Co., Ltd. released a comprehensive simple insurance "(no) guardian angel NEW simple insurance" tailored to the sick, which was launched by Dongyang Life Insurance Co., Ltd. (082640). The insurance is a product developed so that subscribers can choose the necessary guarantees using subdivided special contract benefits and easily subscribe.When signing up for simple insurance, △ hospitalization required within 2 months, surgery required, and additional tests required △ hospitalization required within N years (no question if N=0) △ disease status within 5 years (cancer, angina, myocardial infarction, stroke, cirrhosis, heart valve disease, and chronic renal failure during dialysis). The subscription threshold was drastically lowered by notifying only whether they were hospitalized within N years, not whether they were hospitalized or operated.Dongyang Life Insurance has launched a comprehensive simple insurance tailored to the sick. ⓒ Dongyang Life Products pays 1 million won in death insurance in case of death under the main contract for death guarantee. In addition, all major collateral can be guaranteed with one insurance through 73 special contracts such as cancer, disease, disaster, hospitalization, and surgery. It is based on the main contract subscription amount of 1 million won.It is characterized by special agreements related to various preventive and precautionary symptoms and treatment. The "Special Agreement for Supporting Simple Benefit Cancer MRI Tests (Renewal Type)" pays 50,000 won only once a year for the purpose of diagnosing and treating cancer. "(Non)Simple Cancer Diagnosis Cost Special Agreement" and "(Non)Simple Gastric Cancer Diagnosis Special Agreement" guarantee 10 million won only for the first time when diagnosed with liver cancer and stomach cancer, respectively, during the insurance period. In addition, various products such as △ (no) simple cancer multi-vinch robot surgery special drug (renewal type)_cancer 형 guarantee type △ (no) simple specific heart disease (including other arrhythmia) special drug have been prepared.Special medical guarantees such as disease hospitalization and disease surgery have also been strengthened. The "Special Agreement on (No) Simple Medical Guarantee (Disease Hospitalization)" guarantees at least 20,000 won to up to 50,000 won per hospitalization day for 1 to 3 types of diseases, and 10,000 won for 4 to 6 types of diseases. Surgical types are guaranteed up to 3 million won.In addition, the contract conversion system was operated to ease the burden of paying insurance premiums. If there is no accident after the initial contract date, the insurance premium can be paid according to the health condition by adjusting the notification form every year. The age of subscription is from 15 to 80. It is explained that it has resolved the blind spot of insurance for the elderly.◆ Kyobo Life Insurance announced on the 3rd that it will open a channel where consumers can subscribe to insurance directly through mobile and launch a total of seven e-insurance products.The mobile insurance subscription channel focused on expanding consumer options for those in their 30s and 40s who are familiar with digital. It is characterized by allowing consumers to directly select and subscribe to essential guarantees suitable for their respective situations, including guarantees of risks that occur in their daily lives as well as major disease guarantees.Kyobo Life Insurance has been selected as the KSQI Excellent Call Center for 20 consecutive years. ⓒ Kyobo Life Insurance's e insurance products consist of seven types of mini-insurance that can be easily subscribed, including △ cancer care △ polyp care △ brain and heart care △ lifestyle care △ infection care △ injury care △ one-year savings insurance. You can use subscription reviews left by subscribers and frequently asked questions for each product to help you choose the right product.It plans to provide counseling and maintenance services on all channels, including phone and face-to-face counseling, to those who subscribe to e-insurance, and provide experiences throughout exploration, subscription, and maintenance.Kyobo Life Insurance expects this channel to play a key role in the entire collaboration process of affiliates. It is expected to have a synergy effect at the group level to provide personalized services to customers.◆ Hanwha Insurance, Hanwha Signature Women's Health Insurance (000370), which is released by Hanwha Insurance and Hanwha Signature Women's Health Insurance, will sell new products of Hanwha Signature Women's Health Insurance from the 3rd. It is characterized by providing special contracts considering women's life cycles, childbirth support, and infertility care.The product is the first work of LIFEPLUS Femtech Research Institute established in June. It is a product that contains women's unique physiological phenomena such as menstruation, pregnancy, childbirth, menopause, and menopause, as well as guarantees and services specialized for women such as breast cancer, thyroid cancer, ovaries, and uterine cancer. △ The focus was on women's specialized risks such as women's specialized integrated diagnosis fee △ childbirth support package △ infertility care package △ accident-free conversion discount system.Hanwha Insurance has launched Hanwha Signature Women's Health Insurance. ⓒ Hanwha Insurance, in particular, is characterized by the establishment of the industry's first integrated women-specific diagnosis fee. In addition to cancer diagnosis costs such as breast, ovary, uterus, and thyroid gland, it is widely guaranteed as a single special contract to diagnose pre-cancer symptoms such as hyperthyroidism. The product added "more than 50% post-delay disorder and cerebrovascular and ischemic heart disease" to the special contract requirements for payment support.The maternity support package was developed by collecting opinions from women who feel burdened by the immediate increase in living expenses due to childcare while household income decreases due to leave of absence after childbirth. One year after childbirth, Hanwha Non-life Insurance will pay the guarantee insurance premium. When taking a leave of absence due to childcare, the payment of insurance premiums was suspended for one year to reduce the burden of insurance premiums.The infertility care package is a special contract developed after research to support low birth rates and women's infertility problems. A special agreement was formed in accordance with the diagnosis-treatment-fertility treatment cycle of infertility. When diagnosed with infertility, 1 million won is paid for the first time, and up to 3 million won is provided for artificial insemination treatment. A congratulatory money of up to 4 million won will be given to childbirth after infertility treatment. It is operated as a renewal type with a maturity of 3 years and 10 years. The age of subscription is 15 to 70.◆AXA Insurance and AXA Insurance will strengthen driver discount special contracts.
