This is due to the discovery of Gyeongnam Bank's failure to comply with the credit provision process.View of the Financial Supervisory Service's office building. ⓒ According to the Financial Supervisory Service's current Banking Act and Enforcement Decree, banks must go through a resolution process with the approval of all board members in advance if they provide 10/100 of their equity capital or more than 5 billion won.However, in July 2018, Kyongnam Bank decided to extend the maturity of BNK Capital, the largest shareholder's special relationship, and to provide credit, including 150 billion won in corporate driving general fund rotation loans, without approval from all incumbent directors. BNK Financial Group holds a 100% stake in Kyongnam Bank and BNK Capital.In addition, only brief information, such as whether it is eligible and the credit limit, was included in the agenda of the board of directors of Kyongnam Bank. Among the pre-monitoring checklists, the inspection items on the board of directors' matters are excluded from the report and disclosure of the credit offering procedures, making it impossible to inspect.In response, the Financial Supervisory Service also notified Kyongnam Bank of one improvement to strengthen internal control for compliance with reporting and disclosure obligations and procedures.
message: The following news article is summarized in three sentences, limiting the length of the total answer to 300 characters. + content_trans
response: Kyongnam Bank has been fined 40 million won for violating the Banking Act by failing to comply with the credit offering process for major shareholders. The Financial Supervisory Service also took precautions against one executive. The bank extended credit to its largest shareholder without approval from all directors and did not provide sufficient information for inspection.

title: [뱅크룸] 신한은행, 신한 SOHO사관학교 25기 과정 개강 외
title_trans: [Bank Room] Shinhan Bank, Shinhan SOHO Academy 25th course open
content: 19일 뱅크룸. ⓒ 프라임경제 신한은행(055550)은 '신한 SOHO사관학교 25기'를 개강했다고 19일 밝혔다. 이날 IBK기업은행(024110)은 프랑스 파리 OECD 본부 개최 중소기업 관련 인물사진전에 김성태 IBK기업은행장이 금융접근성 대표 인물로 선정됐다고 발표했으며 KB국민은행(105560)은 '2022 KB Green Wave Report'를 발간했다.신한은행은 청년 자영업자(만19~39세) 및 예비 창업자를 대상으로 마케팅전략, 사업운영 노하우 등의 경영 컨설팅을 제공하는 '신한 SOHO사관학교'를 실시한다. 신한은행은 이번 25기 과정을 통해 △사업 성공을 위한 브랜딩 및 홍보전략 △소상공인에게 유용한 금융지원 제도 △자영업자가 꼭 알아야 하는 법률 등 사업운영에 필요한 내용에 대해 8주간 집중 교육할 예정이다. 해당 과정은 2017년 처음 시작한 이후 24기, 약 700명의 자영업자들이 참여한 바 있다.IBK기업은행은 김성태 IBK기업은행장이 중소기업 관련 인물사진전에 금융접근성을 대표하는 인물로 선정됐다고 밝혔다. OECD는 오는 27~28일 개최될 중소기업 장관 회의에 맞춰 대표 인물들의 중요성을 환기하고자 이번 사진전을 기획했다. 사진전에는 △중소기업 회복력 △금융접근성 △디지털전환 등 총 8가지 테마를 대표하는 9명의 사진과 메시지가 OECD 본관 로비와 중소기업 장관 회의 행사장 내 전시될 예정이다. 전시는 15일부터 29일까지 진행된다. 김성태 은행장을 비롯해 덴마크 스타트업협회장 Esben Gadsboll, 스타트업 캠퍼스 Station F의 액셀러레이터 Chrystele Sanon 등도 함께 선정됐다.KB국민은행은 ESG 전략 중 기후변화 대응과 책임투자 이행을 연계해 기술한 환경보고서 'KB Green Wave Report'를 발간했다. 이번 보고서는 4가지 핵심 주제(Invest Green·Promote Green·Practice Green·Manage Green)를 통해 △중소·중견기업을 대상으로 한 ESG 관련 서비스 등 소개 △생물다양성 보존 활동 △탄소배출 저감 활동 △금융활동을 통한 기후변화 리스크 관리 등을 기술했다. 또 친환경 경영의 일환으로 디지털보고서 형태로 발간됐으며 관련 웹사이트 및 동영상으로 연결도 가능하다. 보고서 전문은 KB국민은행 홈페이지를 통해 확인할 수 있다.
content_trans: Bank room on the 19th. ⓒ Prime Economy Shinhan Bank (055550) announced on the 19th that it has opened the 25th Shinhan SOHO Academy. IBK Industrial Bank (024110) announced that Kim Sung-tae, president of IBK Industrial Bank, was selected as a representative of financial accessibility at the OECD headquarters in Paris, France, and KB Kookmin Bank (105560) published the 2022 KB Green Wave Report.Shinhan Bank will conduct the "Shinhan SOHO Academy," which provides management consulting on marketing strategies and business operation know-how to young self-employed people (19-39) and prospective start-ups. Through this 25th course, Shinhan Bank will focus on training for eight weeks on business operations, including △ branding and promotion strategies for business success △ financial support systems useful to small business owners △ laws that self-employed people must know. Since the course first began in 2017, about 700 self-employed people have participated in the 24th period.IBK Industrial Bank of Korea said Kim Sung-tae, president of IBK Industrial Bank of Korea, was selected as a representative of financial accessibility in a photo exhibition of figures related to small and medium-sized companies. The OECD planned this photo exhibition to remind the importance of representatives in time for the ministerial meeting of small and medium-sized enterprises to be held from the 27th to the 28th. At the photo exhibition, nine photos and messages representing a total of eight themes, including △ SME resilience △ financial accessibility △ digital transformation, will be displayed in the lobby of the OECD main building and the venue of the SME ministers's meeting. The exhibition runs from the 15th to the 29th. Bank President Kim Sung-tae, Danish Startup Association President Esben Gadsboll, and Startup Campus Station F accelerator Crystal Sanon were also selected.KB Kookmin Bank published an environmental report called 'KB Green Wave Report' that describes the response to climate change and the implementation of responsible investment among ESG strategies. This report describes four key topics (Invest Green, Promote Green, Practice Green, Management Green) △ ESG-related services for small and medium-sized companies △ biodiversity preservation activities △ carbon emission reduction activities △ climate change risk management through financial activities. It was also published in the form of a digital report as part of eco-friendly management and can be linked to related websites and videos. The full report can be found on KB Kookmin Bank's website.
message: The following news article is summarized in three sentences, limiting the length of the total answer to 300 characters. + content_trans
response: Shinhan Bank has opened the 25th Shinhan SOHO Academy providing management consulting to young self-employed individuals and start-ups. IBK Industrial Bank president Kim Sung-tae was selected as a representative of financial accessibility in a photo exhibition at the OECD headquarters in Paris. KB Kookmin Bank published the 'KB Green Wave Report' focusing on climate change response and responsible investment among ESG strategies.

title: 애플페이가 몰고 온 수수료…삼성페이, 물밑 협상 '시동'
title_trans: Fees brought by Apple Pay...Samsung Pay 'starts' behind-the-scenes negotiations
content: 애플페이 열풍이 거세다. 현대카드의 애플페이 단독 사용 기한이 오는 9월 종료를 앞두면서 주요 카드사들도 도입 채비에 나서는 모습이다. 이르면 9월 티머니 교통카드도 지원할 것으로 예상돼 하반기에도 열풍은 지속될 전망이다.이같이 애플페이가 수수료를 받으면서도 세력을 빠르게 키우자 삼성전자도 삼성페이 유료화 가능성을 거론했다. 애플이 몰고 온 수수료 때문이다. 애플은 현대카드를 상대로 연간 0.15% 결제 수수료를 받고 있다. 그간 삼성전자는 결제 수수료를 받지 않았다. 하지만 시장 상황이 급변하자 유료화 전환 카드를 꺼내들었다.전업 카드사 7곳(신한·삼성·현대·KB국민·롯데·우리·하나카드)과 삼성전자의 계약은 8월말 모두 만료된다.아이폰으로 애플페이를 결제하는 모습. ⓒ 현대카드업계 관계자는 "계약 만료일이 도래하는 만큼 수수료 부과에 대한 논의가 이뤄지는 것은 어찌 보면 당연한 처사"라며 "기존 간편결제 시장 상황이 변하고 있는 만큼 여러 방향에서 논의를 진행하는 것으로 보인다"고 말했다.이어 "만일 모든 카드사들이 애플페이에 합류한다면 삼성전자만 수수료를 부과하지 않을 이유는 없다"며 "삼성전자가 수수료를 부과하게 된다면 카드사들이 지불할 수수료는 약 1000억원에 이를 것으로 예상된다"고 덧붙였다.이런 상황에 최근 삼성전자 삼성페이 실무자들은 신한·KB국민카드와 접촉한 것으로 알려졌다. 주요 카드사와 개별협상에 나서면서 애플페이 견제를 본격화한 것 아니냐는 목소리가 나온다.삼성전자의 협상 시점도 주요 금융지주 카드 3사(신한·KB국민·우리카드)가 애플페이 사업참여 의향서를 제출한 시점과 맞물린다. 3사의 결제 금액 기준 점유율은 전체 시장의 40% 수준에 달한다. 이들이 애플페이를 도입하게 되면, 애플페이의 몸집은 더욱 불어나게 된다. 이는 곧 삼성페이 시장 점유율 감소로 이어질 가능성이 커 삼성전자가 협상에 시동을 걸었다.협상에서 삼성전자와 신한·KB국민카드 실무자들은 재계약 필요성에 대해 가볍게 언급한 것으로 알려졌다. 구체적 논의는 아직 이뤄지지 않았으며, 계약 만료 시점인 8월까지 논의를 이어갈 것으로 추측된다.현재 카드사들은 자사 애플리케이션 카드로 삼성페이 서비스를 구현하고 있다. 매년 약 50억원의 인증비용을 부담하고 있다. 삼성페이가 수수료까지 부과한다면 카드사들의 부담은 더욱 가중된다. 그러나 국내 간편결제 시장 점유율 1위 삼성페이를 포기하기는 현실적으로 어려워 삼성페이 유료화에 난색을 표하고 있는 실정이다.올해 카드사들의 실적이 내리막길을 걷고 있는 만큼 향후 삼성전자의 수수료 부과 결정이 미칠 파장은 상당할 것으로 분석된다.카드업계 관계자는 "아직까지 구체적으로 협의된 내용은 없는 상태다"라며 "수수료 인상 시 카드혜택이 줄어들 가능성이 높아 논의를 더 이어나가야 한다"고 답했다.이와 관련 삼성전자 관계자는 "기존 계약 갱신이 만료된 것은 사실"이라면서도 "수수료 부과 여부는 아직 정해지지 않았다"고 밝혔다.
content_trans: Apple Pay is booming. Major credit card companies are also preparing to introduce Hyundai Card as the deadline for using Apple Pay alone is set to end in September. T-money transportation cards are also expected to be supported as early as September, and the craze is expected to continue in the second half of the year.As Apple Pay quickly grew its power while receiving fees, Samsung Electronics also mentioned the possibility of paying Samsung Pay. This is because of the commission that Apple brought. Apple receives 0.15% annual payment commission from Hyundai Card. Until now, Samsung Electronics has not received payment fees. However, as the market situation changed rapidly, he took out a paid conversion card.Contracts between seven full-time credit card companies (Shinhan, Samsung, Hyundai, KB Kookmin, Lotte, Woori, and Hana Card) and Samsung Electronics will all expire at the end of August.Paying for Apple Pay with an iPhone. ⓒ An official from the Hyundai Card industry said, "It is natural to discuss the imposition of fees as the contract expires," adding, "As the existing simple payment market situation is changing, it seems to be discussing in various directions.""If all credit card companies join Apple Pay, there is no reason why Samsung Electronics will not charge fees," he said. "If Samsung Electronics charges fees, the fees that credit card companies will pay are expected to reach about 100 billion won."In this situation, Samsung Pay practitioners at Samsung Electronics recently contacted Shinhan and KB Kookmin Card. There are voices saying that Apple Pay may have begun to be checked in earnest by negotiating individually with major credit card companies.The timing of Samsung Electronics' negotiations also coincides with the time when three major financial holding card companies (Shinhan, KB Kookmin, and Woori Card) submitted letters of intent to participate in the Apple Pay business. The market share of the three companies based on payment amounts to 40% of the total market. If they introduce Apple Pay, the size of Apple Pay will increase further. This is likely to lead to a decrease in Samsung Pay market share, so Samsung Electronics has started negotiations.During the negotiations, working-level officials at Samsung Electronics, Shinhan and KB Kookmin Card reportedly lightly mentioned the need to renew their contracts. No specific discussion has been made yet, and it is expected that the discussion will continue until August, when the contract expires.Currently, credit card companies are implementing Samsung Pay services with their application cards. It bears about 5 billion won in certification costs every year. If Samsung Pay charges commission fees, the burden on credit card companies will increase. However, it is practically difficult to give up Samsung Pay, the No. 1 market share in the domestic simple payment market, and it is reluctant to pay for Samsung Pay.As credit card companies' performance is on the decline this year, the impact of Samsung Electronics' decision to impose fees in the future is expected to be significant.An official from the credit card industry said, "There has been no detailed discussion so far," adding, "We need to continue discussions as card benefits are likely to decrease if fees are raised."In this regard, an official from Samsung Electronics said, "It is true that the renewal of the existing contract has expired," but added, "It has not been decided whether to impose a fee yet."
message: The following news article is summarized in three sentences, limiting the length of the total answer to 300 characters. + content_trans
response: Major credit card companies in South Korea are considering introducing fees for using Samsung Pay following Apple Pay's move to charge a commission for transactions. The contracts between seven credit card companies and Samsung Electronics will expire in August and discussions regarding the imposition of fees are expected to continue. The decision could have a significant impact on credit card companies' performance especially as their profits have been declining this year.

title: 가족 계좌까지 악용한 횡령에…금감원, 참저축은행 제재
title_trans: For embezzlement that abused family accounts...Financial Supervisory Service to sanction Cham Savings Bank
content: 참저축은행에 대한 금융감독원 제재공시. ⓒ 금융감독원 대구 소재 참저축은행이 연이어 발생한 횡령사고로 인해 금융감독원으로부터 무더기 제재를 받았다.16일 검사결과 제재공시에 따르면 금융감독원(이하 금감원)은 참저축은행에 기관주의를, 임직원 10명에게는 감봉·주의·견책 등에 상당하는 제재를 내렸다.금감원은 참저축은행에 대한 검사를 통해 3억2900만원 규모의 횡령사고를 적발했다. 횡령을 저지른 인원은 2명이다. A씨는 지난 2017년 참저축은행의 자금관리·결산 업무를 담당하면서 회사자금을 가족의 계좌로 이체해 2억2000만원을 횡령했다.A씨는 책임자가 자리를 비운 사이 전산단말기의 아이디와 비밀번호를 도용해 횡령을 저지른 것으로 알려졌다.아울러 채권관리 업무를 담당하던 B씨는 2015년 1월27일부터 2017년 11월21일 기간 중 공탁금을 법무사에게 이체하는 것으로 속여 팀원이 집행하게 하고 전표에 본인 인감 및 무단 도용한 책임자 인감을 날인했다. 이를 통해 빼돌린 돈은 1억900만원이다.참저축은행은 이들의 횡령 사실을 2018년이 되어서야 파악하고, 같은해 8월 금감원에 보고했다.금감원은 참저축은행이 금융사지배구조법을 어겼다고 판단했다. 금융사지배구조법 제24조·제27조에 따르면 저축은행은 준법감시인 지원조직 및 위험관리 전담조직을 구성·유지해야한다.금감원 관계자는 "참저축은행은 검사대상기간에 준법감시인 및 위험관리책임자의 직무수행을 돕는 지원조직·전담조직을 구성하지 않았다"며 "현재는 해당 조직을 마련하는 등 시정 조처했다"고 말했다.
content_trans: Disclosure of sanctions by the Financial Supervisory Service against Cham Savings Bank. ⓒ The Financial Supervisory Service's Daegu-based True Savings Bank was sanctioned by the Financial Supervisory Service for a series of embezzlement accidents.According to the inspection results on the 16th, the Financial Supervisory Service (hereinafter referred to as the Financial Supervisory Service) imposed institutionalism on True Savings Bank and imposed sanctions equivalent to salary cuts, caution, and reprimands on 10 executives and employees.The Financial Supervisory Service detected an embezzlement accident worth 329 million won through an inspection of Cham Savings Bank. There are two people who committed embezzlement. In 2017, A embezzled 220 million won by transferring company funds to his family's account while in charge of the management and settlement of funds at Cham Savings Bank.A is known to have committed embezzlement by stealing the ID and password of the computer terminal while the person in charge was away.In addition, B, who was in charge of bond management, deceived the team member to execute the deposit by transferring it to the lawyer during the period from January 27, 2015 to November 21, 2017, and sealed his seal and seal of person in charge of unauthorized theft on the slip. The money stolen through this is 109 million won.Cham Savings Bank only found out about their embezzlement in 2018 and reported it to the Financial Supervisory Service in August of the same year.The Financial Supervisory Service judged that Cham Savings Bank violated the Financial Companies Governance Act. According to Articles 24 and 27 of the Financial Companies Governance Act, savings banks must form and maintain a compliance monitor support organization and a dedicated organization for risk management.A Financial Supervisory Service official said, "Cham Savings Bank has not formed a support organization or dedicated organization to help compliance monitors and risk management managers perform their duties during the inspection period."
message: The following news article is summarized in three sentences, limiting the length of the total answer to 300 characters. + content_trans
response: Cham Savings Bank has been sanctioned by the Financial Supervisory Service for embezzlement incidents totaling 329 million won. A and B were found responsible for the embezzlement with A transferring company funds to a family account and B deceiving a team member to execute a deposit. Cham Savings Bank failed to comply with the Financial Companies Governance Act which resulted in the imposed sanctions.
